item.title: 穆迪下调前景，中国国有银行预计将支持人民币 - 消息人士
item.description:
China's major state-owned banks were busy buying the yuan in currency markets on Tuesday to prevent it from weakening too much, two sources with knowledge of the matter said, with buying intensifying after rating agency Moody's cut China's outlook to negative in the afternoon.翻译:两位知情人士表示，中国主要国有银行周二忙于在货币市场买入人民币，以防止人民币大幅贬值，在评级机构穆迪下午将中国前景下调至负面后，买入力度加大。

State banks were spotted swapping yuan for U.S. dollars in the onshore swap market and quickly selling those dollars in the spot market to support the yuan throughout the whole trading session, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，国有银行被发现在境内掉期市场上将人民币兑换成美元，并在现货市场上迅速出售这些美元，以在整个交易时段支撑人民币。

But the banks' dollar selling became very forceful after the Moody's statement, one source said.翻译:但一位消息人士称，在穆迪发表声明后，银行的美元抛售变得非常猛烈。

China state banks have in the past year often sold dollars to slow the yuan's decline against the U.S. dollar. Markets have often seen the moves as a sign of official attempts to relieve pressure on the currency, though banks could also be trading for their own accounts.翻译:去年，中国国有银行经常抛售美元，以减缓人民币兑美元汇率的下跌。市场经常将这些举措视为官方试图缓解货币压力的迹象，尽管银行也可能在为自己的账户进行交易。

Moody's on Tuesday cut its outlook on China's government credit ratings to negative from stable, citing expectations of lower medium-term economic growth and risks from a deep correction in the country's vast property sector.翻译:穆迪周二将中国政府信用评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是中期经济增长放缓的预期以及中国庞大房地产行业深度调整的风险。

With China's economy sputtering and the U.S. dollar surging until recently, the yuan has had a volatile year, having weakened 6.14% to the dollar at one point before giving back much of the losses on recent views that U.S. interest rates have peaked.翻译:直到最近，随着中国经济的低迷和美元的飙升，人民币经历了动荡的一年，兑美元一度贬值6.14%，之后又因近期美国利率已见顶的观点而回吐了大部分损失。

The yuan strengthened 2.55% in November, its best month this year, but it is still down 3% year-to-date.翻译:人民币11月升值2.55%，为今年表现最好的一个月，但今年迄今仍下跌3%。

However, some analysts said the impact on the yuan from the Moody's decision will not be sustainable.翻译:不过，也有分析人士表示，穆迪决定对人民币的影响不会持续。

"The issues plaguing the property sector are not new," said Khoon Goh, head of Asia research at ANZ.翻译:澳新银行亚洲研究主管孔吴表示：“困扰房地产行业的问题并不新鲜。”

"The steps taken by the authorities recently should see a bottom soon. The upcoming U.S. data will be more important for the near-term direction of the yuan," Goh said, referring to a spate of government measures to revive the real estate market.翻译:“当局最近采取的措施应该很快就会见底。即将公布的美国数据对于人民币的近期走向更为重要，”吴说，他指的是政府为重振房地产市场而采取的一系列措施。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom and Tom Westbrook; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Kim Coghill翻译:上海新闻室和汤姆·威斯布鲁克的报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Kim Coghill

item.title: 美元在就业数据泛滥之前站稳脚跟
item.description:
The U.S. dollar regained some ground on Tuesday and hovered near a one-week high against a basket of currencies, ahead of a flurry of employment data that could upend investor expectations for the outlook for interest rates.翻译:周二，美元兑一篮子货币收复部分失地，徘徊在一周高点附近，一系列就业数据可能会颠覆投资者对利率前景的预期。

The euro took an early knock from comments by European Central Bank member Isabel Schnabel, who said in an interview with Reuters that interest rate hikes were off the table, given the "remarkable" fall in inflation.翻译:欧元早盘受到欧洲央行成员伊莎贝尔·施纳贝尔言论的打击，施纳贝尔在接受路透社采访时表示，鉴于通胀“显着”下降，加息是不可能的。

Bitcoin held close to its highest since April last year, near $42,000, as a decline in the dollar in recent weeks has diverted cash into riskier assets.翻译:比特币价格维持在去年 4 月以来的最高水平，接近 42,000 美元，原因是最近几周美元贬值，导致现金转向风险较高的资产。

Investors are keenly awaiting Friday's U.S. non-farm payrolls report for November. But before then, the monthly JOLTS report - which captures monthly hirings and firings - lands later on Tuesday and the private-sector ADP survey is due on Wednesday.翻译:投资者热切等待周五公布的美国11 月非农就业报告。但在此之前，月度 JOLTS 报告（反映每月招聘和解雇情况）将于周二晚些时候发布，私营部门 ADP 调查将于周三公布。

Both could shape expectations for Friday's number and make for volatile trading in the run-up, given the power of monetary policy expectations to drive currencies right now.翻译:考虑到目前货币政策预期对货币的推动力，两者都可能影响周五数据的预期，并导致交易波动。

"The market's main focus now is still very much on what central banks are going to do next year in terms of policy. We've had this very dramatic dovish repricing of rate expectations for both the Fed and the ECB over the past week, so that's certainly having an impact on FX markets," MUFG currency strategist Lee Hardman said.翻译:“现在市场的主要焦点仍然是央行明年将在政策方面采取什么行动。过去一周，我们对美联储和欧洲央行的利率预期进行了非常戏剧性的鸽派重新定价，因此这肯定会对外汇市场产生影响，”三菱日联金融集团 (MUFG) 货币策略师李·哈德曼 (Lee Hardman) 表示。

The dollar index was up 0.1%, around one-week highs.翻译:美元指数上涨0.1%，接近一周高位。

Analysts said the dollar's nudge up was in part due to a reversal of its heavy selloff in recent weeks, which saw the dollar index falling some 3% in November, its steepest monthly decline in a year.翻译:分析师表示，美元小幅上涨的部分原因是最近几周大幅抛售的逆转，美元指数11月份下跌约3%，创一年来最大单月跌幅。

"I think it's maybe just a little bit of a reassessment as to the U.S. dollar having fallen too far, and too fast," said Sean Callow, a senior currency strategist at Westpac.

CUTS PRICED IN

Traders have priced in at least 125 basis points worth of rate cuts from the Federal Reserve next year, with a good chance of 50 bps by June, according to CME's FedWatch tool.翻译:根据 CME 的 FedWatch 工具，交易员已消化美联储明年降息至少 125 个基点的预期，到 6 月份降息的可能性很大，达到 50 个基点。

"The Fed will be reactive to the hard data and not anticipatory of it," said Thierry Wizman, Macquarie's global foreign exchange and interest rates strategist. "So as long as the activity data deteriorates and inflation retreats, convergence toward lower yields will resume."翻译:麦格理全球外汇和利率策略师蒂埃里·维兹曼(Thierry Wizman)表示：“美联储将对硬数据做出反应，而不是做出预测。” “因此，只要活动数据恶化且通胀回落，收益率就会恢复趋同。”

By comparison, futures show there is an 82% chance the ECB could deliver its first rate cut by next March. Inflation across the euro zone has fallen more quickly than most anticipated, as evidenced by last Thursday's consumer price data.翻译:相比之下，期货显示欧洲央行明年 3 月首次降息的可能性为 82%。上周四的消费者价格数据证明，整个欧元区的通胀下降速度比大多数人预期的要快。

The euro has lost 1.34% since then and the data was enough to persuade ECB board member Schnabel to change her stance on rate cuts. A month ago, she had insisted hikes must remain an option.翻译:此后欧元已下跌1.34%，该数据足以说服欧洲央行董事会成员施纳贝尔改变降息立场。一个月前，她坚称加息仍是一种选择。

The euro was last down 0.1% at $1.0821 and down 0.1% against the pound at 85.715 pence.翻译:欧元最后下跌 0.1% 至 1.0821 美元，兑英镑下跌 0.1% 至 85.715 便士。

Meanwhile, the yuan was unperturbed by a Moody's decision to cut China's credit outlook to "negative" on Tuesday. The ratings agency cited lower medium-term growth and the ongoing decline in the property sector.翻译:与此同时，穆迪周二决定将中国信用前景下调至“负面”，人民币并未受到影响。该评级机构指出，中期增长较低，房地产行业持续下滑。

In the offshore market, the yuan was broadly steady at 7.153 per dollar, having traded at 7.16 earlier on.翻译:在离岸市场，人民币兑美元汇率大体稳定在7.153，此前为7.16。

Sterling was little changed at $1.2628, while the yen strengthened, leaving the dollar down 0.1% at 147.05.翻译:英镑汇率变化不大，报1.2628美元，而日元走强，导致美元汇率下跌0.1%，报147.05。

The Australian dollar fell 0.7% to $0.6576, below Monday's four-month high, after the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) kept rates at a 12-year high of 4.35% on Tuesday, as widely expected, and noted that economic data received since November had been broadly in line with forecasts.翻译:澳大利亚储备银行 (RBA) 周二如普遍预期将利率维持在 12 年高点 4.35%，并指出自11 月份的情况与预测基本一致。

"The Aussie has had a great run in recent weeks and was arguably overbought over the near-term," said Matt Simpson, senior market analyst at City Index.翻译:City Index 高级市场分析师马特·辛普森 (Matt Simpson) 表示：“澳元最近几周表现出色，可以说在短期内已经超买。”

In cryptocurrencies, bitcoin was last down 1.15% at $41,504, narrowly below Monday's peak of $42,404, its highest since April 2022.翻译:加密货币方面，比特币最新下跌 1.15%，至 41,504 美元，略低于周一峰值 42,404 美元，这是 2022 年 4 月以来的最高点。

The world's largest cryptocurrency has gained 150% this year, fuelled in part by optimism that U.S. regulators will soon approve exchange-traded spot bitcoin funds (ETFs), which could open the bitcoin market to millions more investors.翻译:全球最大的加密货币今年上涨了 150%，部分原因是美国监管机构将很快批准交易所交易的现货比特币基金 (ETF)，这可能会向数百万投资者开放比特币市场。

"$40,000 has acted like a magnet since bitcoin finally broke through $30,000 in late October," said crypto-services firm Nexo co-founder Antoni Trenchev. "It was only a matter of time before the next round number succumbed as enthusiasm about a spot ETF reaches fever pitch."翻译:加密服务公司 Nexo 联合创始人 Antoni Trenchev 表示：“自从 10 月底比特币最终突破 30,000 美元以来，40,000 美元就像一块磁石。” “随着对现货 ETF 的热情达到狂热程度，下一轮数字屈服只是时间问题。”

Additioanl reporting by Rae Wee in Singapore; Editing by Sam Holmes, Christopher Cushing and Susan Fenton翻译:Rae Wee 在新加坡的补充报道；山姆·霍姆斯、克里斯托弗·库欣和苏珊·芬顿编辑

item.title: 穆迪将中国信贷前景下调至负面，理由是增长放缓和房地产风险
item.description:
Ratings agency Moody's on Tuesday cut its outlook on China's government credit ratings to negative from stable, citing lower medium-term economic growth and risks from a major correction in the country's vast property sector.翻译:评级机构穆迪周二将中国政府信用评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是中期经济增长放缓以及中国庞大房地产行业出现重大调整的风险。

The downgrade reflects growing evidence that authorities will have to provide financial support for debt-laden local governments and state firms, posing broad risks to China's fiscal, economic and institutional strength, Moody's said in a statement.翻译:穆迪在一份声明中表示，此次降级反映出越来越多的证据表明，当局将不得不向负债累累的地方政府和国有企业提供财政支持，这对中国的财政、经济和机构实力构成广泛风险。

"The outlook change also reflects the increased risks related to structurally and persistently lower medium-term economic growth and the ongoing downsizing of the property sector," Moody's said.翻译:穆迪表示：“前景的变化还反映出与结构性和持续较低的中期经济增长以及房地产行业持续缩减相关的风险增加。”

The move by Moody's was its first change on its China view since it cut its rating by one notch to A1 in 2017, also citing expectations of slowing growth and rising debt.翻译:穆迪此举是自2017年将中国评级下调一级至A1以来首次改变其对中国的看法，理由也是经济增长放缓和债务上升的预期。

While Moody's affirmed China's A1 long-term local and foreign-currency issuer ratings on Tuesday, it said it expects the country's annual GDP growth to slow to 4.0% in 2024 and 2025, and to average 3.8% from 2026 to 2030.翻译:尽管穆迪周二确认了中国 A1 长期本外币发行人评级，但表示预计 2024 年和 2025 年中国 GDP 增速将放缓至 4.0%，2026 年至 2030 年平均增速为 3.8%。

Most analysts believe the economy is on track to hit the government's annual growth target of around 5% this year, but activity is highly uneven.翻译:大多数分析师认为，今年经济有望实现政府设定的 5% 左右的年度增长目标，但经济活动极不平衡。

The world's second-biggest economy has struggled to mount a strong post-COVID recovery as a deepening crisis in the housing market, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions have dented momentum. A flurry of policy support measures have proven only modestly beneficial, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:由于房地产市场危机加深、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势削弱了经济增长势头，全球第二大经济体在新冠疫情后难以实现强劲复苏。事实证明，一系列政策支持措施的效果有限，这加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

Local government debt reached 92 trillion yuan ($12.6 trillion), or 76% of China's economic output in 2022, up from 62.2% in 2019, according to the latest data from the International Monetary Fund (IMF).翻译:国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 的最新数据显示，到 2022 年，地方政府债务将达到 92 万亿元人民币（12.6 万亿美元），占中国经济产出的 76%，高于 2019 年的 62.2%。

After years of over-investment in infrastructure, plummeting returns from land sales, and soaring costs to battle COVID-19, economists say debt-laden municipalities now represent a major risk to the economy.翻译:经济学家表示，经过多年基础设施过度投资、土地出售回报大幅下降以及抗击新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 成本飙升，负债累累的城市现在对经济构成了重大风险。

China's Finance Ministry said it was disappointed by Moody's downgrade, adding that the economy will maintain its rebound an positive trend. It also said property and local government risks are controllable.翻译:中国财政部表示，对穆迪下调评级感到失望，并补充称，经济将继续保持回升向好态势。它还表示，房地产和地方政府风险可控。

"Moody's concerns about China's economic growth prospects, fiscal sustainability and other aspects are unnecessary," the ministry said.翻译:“穆迪对中国经济增长前景、财政可持续性等方面的担忧是不必要的，”商务部表示。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139.84 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year to help kick-start activity, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.翻译:10 月，中国公布了一项计划，将在年底前发行 1 万亿元人民币（合 1,398.4 亿美元）的主权债券，以帮助启动经济活动，将 2023 年预算赤字目标从占国内生产总值 (GDP) 的 3.8% 提高到原来的3%。

The central bank has also implemented modest interest rate cuts and pumped more cash into the economy in recent months, pledging to sustain policy support.翻译:近几个月来，央行还实施了小幅降息并向经济注入更多现金，承诺维持政策支持。

Reporting by Gnaneshwar Rajan in Bengaluru and Kevin Yao in Beijing; Editing by Tom Hogue and Kim Coghill翻译:Gnaneshwar Rajan 在班加罗尔和 Kevin Yao 在北京的报道；汤姆·霍格和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 空调企业可持续设计面临高成本
item.description:
When temperatures climbed north of 40 degrees Celsius (104 degrees Fahrenheit) in Seville during this summer's crushing heatwave in Europe, air conditioning use jumped 23% in the southern Spanish city compared to how many hours ACs ran during the same period in 2022.翻译:今年夏天， 欧洲遭遇严重热浪，塞维利亚气温攀升至 40 摄氏度（104 华氏度）以北，与 2022 年同期相比，这座西班牙南部城市的空调使用时间增加了 23%。

Lisbon's average AC use, too, went up by about 41% in mid-June to mid-July, compared with the same period the previous year, according to data analysis from Sensibo, a company which specializes in smart devices that can control ACs remotely to cut energy use.翻译:根据专门生产可远程控制空调的智能设备的公司 Sensibo 的数据分析，里​​斯本 6 月中旬至 7 月中旬的平均空调使用量也比去年同期增长了约 41%减少能源使用。

While cooling technologies can save lives during deadly heat, they also threaten to worsen the climate crisis.翻译:虽然冷却技术可以在酷暑中拯救生命，但它们也有可能加剧气候危机。

The energy used in cooling and refrigerants accounts for about 7% of global greenhouse gas emissions, and demand could more than triple by 2050, according to the International Energy Agency.翻译:据国际能源署称，用于冷却和制冷剂的能源约占全球温室气体排放量的 7%，到 2050 年，需求可能会增加两倍以上。

"We've got a big problem," said Lily Riahi, head of the United Nations Environment Programme's (UNEP) Cool Coalition. "Without strong policy actions, emissions will skyrocket."翻译:“我们遇到了一个大问题，”联合国环境规划署（UNEP）酷联盟负责人莉莉·里亚希（Lily Riahi）说。 “如果没有强有力的政策行动，排放量将会飙升。”

At this year's U.N. climate summit, governments and companies are grappling with the problem by discussing energy efficiency and reining in high-polluting refrigerants.翻译:在今年的联合国气候峰会上，各国政府和企业正在通过讨论能源效率和控制高污染制冷剂来解决这个问题。

Dozens of countries are backing a COP28 pledge to reduce cooling-related emissions by at least 68% by 2050 from 2022 levels.翻译:数十个国家支持 COP28 的承诺，即到 2050 年将与制冷相关的排放量从 2022 年的水平减少至少 68%。

But industry experts say governments need to offer incentives for companies to bring sustainable AC technologies to market and scale up.翻译:但行业专家表示，政府需要为公司提供激励措施，将可持续空调技术推向市场并扩大规模。

Even making today's most efficient units more affordable could help, she said.翻译:她说，即使是让当今最高效的设备变得更便宜也可能有所帮助。

"There is super efficient equipment available today that is not being tapped into," Riahi said. "We need to create demand with policy."

COOL DESIGN

AC companies have been developing better products for years, with units using less power and releasing fewer hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), potent greenhouse gases.翻译:多年来，空调公司一直在开发更好的产品，其设备使用的电力更少，排放的氢氟碳化合物 (HFC) 和强效温室气体也更少。

One way conventional ACs are so energy intensive is through processes for eliminating humidity.翻译:传统空调如此耗能的一种方式是通过消除湿度的过程。

Conventional ACs transfer heat outside by converting gas refrigerants to liquid and back again, which generates cooling.翻译:传统空调通过将气体制冷剂转换为液体并再次转换回来来将热量传递到外部，从而产生冷却效果。

Removing humidity requires cooling air to the point at which water vapour becomes a liquid to be drained. This inability to get rid of humidity without first cooling the air makes conventional ACs less efficient.翻译:去除湿气需要将空气冷却到水蒸气变成液体并排出的程度。如果不首先冷却空气就无法消除湿气，这使得传统空调的效率较低。

"Humidity is what drives comfort, even more than temperature," said Sorin Grama, CEO of the U.S. startup Transaera. "Current air conditioners suck when it comes to removing humidity."翻译:美国初创公司 Transaera 的首席执行官索林·格拉马 (Sorin Grama) 表示：“湿度是影响舒适度的因素，甚至比温度更重要。” “目前的空调在去除湿气方面很糟糕。”

Grama co-founded Transaera in 2018 based on novel cooling materials discovered at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.翻译:Grama 于 2018 年基于麻省理工学院发现的新型冷却材料共同创立了 Transaera。

The company's AC prototype uses these materials to dry out air, aiming to produce fewer emissions than traditional ACs.翻译:该公司的空调原型机使用这些材料来干燥空气，旨在比传统空调产生更少的排放。

Two major AC companies, Gree Electric and Daikin (6367.T), won a 2021 competition supported by the Indian government and nonprofits to build a better air conditioner.翻译:格力电器和大金（6367.T）这两家主要空调公司赢得了印度政府和非营利组织支持的 2021 年制造更好空调的竞赛。

Like Transaera, the winning prototypes focused on removing humidity and achieving a climate impact five times lower than available ACs.翻译:与 Transaera 一样，获胜的原型致力于消除湿度并实现比现有空调低五倍的气候影响。

Two years later, there are no plans to bring those winning prototypes to market. While Gree hopes soon to offer a scaled-back model, Daikin said material costs and supply chain issues were still obstacles.翻译:两年后，没有计划将这些获胜的原型推向市场。尽管格力希望很快推出缩小版车型，但大金表示，材料成本和供应链问题仍然是障碍。

"It's not economically feasible," said Miki Yamanaka, department manager of Daikin's Global Environment Center.

MARKETS OF SCALE

Industry experts say policies and incentives are needed to lower consumer costs. More than 1 billion people living in warm climates still lack access to cooling, according to nonprofit Sustainable Energy for All.翻译:行业专家表示，需要制定政策和激励措施来降低消费者成本。根据非营利组织“人人享有可持续能源”的数据，超过 10 亿生活在温暖气候下的人仍然无法获得制冷。

"Cooling is more like a right than a luxury," said Larissa Gross of climate think tank E3G.翻译:气候智库 E3G 的拉里萨·格罗斯 (Larissa Gross) 表示：“降温更像是一种权利，而不是一种奢侈。”

UNEP's Riahi said governments can consider implementing stricter energy performance standards, clearer efficiency labelling, subsidies or bulk procurement to stimulate demand and lower costs.翻译:环境署的里亚希表示，各国政府可以考虑实施更严格的能源绩效标准、更清晰的能效标签、补贴或批量采购，以刺激需求并降低成本。

Meanwhile, import tariffs can help prevent inefficient, second-hand models being resold in developing countries.翻译:与此同时，进口关税有助于防止低效的二手车型在发展中国家转售。

Gree is not yet releasing commercial models that replicate its super-efficient prototype. Market research suggested people were not willing to pay as much as 150% more, said thermal engineer Baolong Wang of Tsinghua University in Beijing who worked with Gree on its prototype.翻译:格力尚未发布复制其超高效原型的商业模型。与格力合作开发原型机的北京清华大学热工王宝龙表示，市场研究表明人们不愿意多付 150% 的费用。

"Some countries like Indonesia, the economics are not so developed, but they need this kind of cooling," Wang said. "You have to focus on affordable cooling".翻译:“像印度尼西亚这样的国家，经济不那么发达，但他们需要这种冷却，”王说。 “你必须专注于负担得起的冷却”。

The company instead plans to soon market a similar model but for drier conditions in the Middle East. This model uses the prototype's high-efficiency air compressor, but switches to a cheaper refrigerant with higher emissions potential than the prototype's R152a refrigerant, he said.翻译:相反，该公司计划很快推出一款类似的型号，但适用于中东较为干燥的环境。他说，该模型使用原型机的高效空气压缩机，但改用比原型机的 R152a 制冷剂更便宜、排放潜力更高的制冷剂。

Wang said Gree was also working on a model for the more humid Indian market.翻译:王说，格力还在为更加潮湿的印度市场开发一种模型。

Another startup from Britain called Barocal is also working on improving AC technology, with its initial prototype using solid refrigerants instead of climate-polluting gases.翻译:另一家来自英国的初创公司 Barocal 也在致力于改进空调技术，其最初的原型使用固体制冷剂而不是污染气候的气体。

"We've been working hard on a second generation of prototypes that are performing well in all metrics — good cooling power and efficiency," said Barocal founder Xavier Moya, a material physics researcher at the University of Cambridge.翻译:Barocal 创始人、剑桥大学材料物理研究员泽维尔·莫亚 (Xavier Moya) 表示：“我们一直在努力开发第二代原型，该原型在所有指标上都表现良好，即良好的冷却能力和效率。”

The startup Transaera, which last year received $4.5 million in seed funding from U.S. company Carrier's venture capital group, aims to get a product to market by 2025.翻译:初创公司 Transaera 去年从美国公司 Carrier 的风险投资集团获得了 450 万美元的种子资金，目标是到 2025 年将产品推向市场。

"This industry goes slow," Grama said. "You have to generate supply chains and partnerships ... We have to work within the confines of a 100-year-old industry changing its direction."

item.title: 日本边境岛民谴责缺乏援助台湾人逃离袭击的计划
item.description:
Sonkichi Sakihara recalls chancing upon some of the last refugees to arrive on Yonaguni: four men who had sailed more than 2,000 kilometres from Vietnam to reach Japan's westernmost inhabited island. It was 1977.翻译:崎原尊吉 (Sonkichi Sakihara) 回忆起偶然遇见最后一批抵达与那国岛的难民：四名男子从越南航行 2000 多公里到达日本最西端有人居住的岛屿。那是 1977 年。

"I was out checking for stowaways from Taiwan when I found them," Sakihara, 80, said at his family store near the port where he encountered the group, among 113 Vietnamese to make the journey after the war ended.翻译:80 岁的咲原在港口附近的自家商店里说：“我出去检查来自台湾的偷渡者，当时我发现了他们。”他在港口附近的家庭商店里遇到了这群人，他们是战争结束后踏上旅程的 113 名越南人中的一员。

Today, some residents of Yonaguni foresee another refugee crisis that they say their isolated outpost and its dwindling population of less than 1,700 would be ill-equipped to handle. Just 110 kilometres to the west, and occasionally visible from Yonaguni, is Taiwan, the self-ruled island of 24 million that China asserts is its territory and which Beijing is menacing with simulated missile strikes and other displays of military firepower.翻译:如今，与那国岛的一些居民预见到另一场难民危机，他们说，他们孤立的前哨基地和日益减少的不到 1,700 人的人口将无力应对这场危机。台湾以西仅 110 公里处，从与那国岛偶尔可见。这个拥有 2,400 万人口的自治岛屿被中国声称是其领土，北京正在通过模拟导弹袭击和其他军事火力展示来威胁台湾。

Concerned about the potential for conflict, Japan has embarked on its biggest defence build-up since World War Two. But the $290 billion outlay comes without a parallel plan to prepare Yonaguni for a possible humanitarian crisis that residents like Sakihara say could quickly overwhelm their shores.翻译:出于对潜在冲突的担忧，日本开始了自第二次世界大战以来最大规模的防务建设。但 2900 亿美元的支出并没有相应的计划来为与那国岛应对可能的人道主义危机做好准备，像崎原这样的居民表示，这场危机可能很快就会淹没他们的海岸。

In interviews with Reuters, more than two dozen current and former Japanese officials and residents said hundreds, if not thousands of refugees could try to reach Yonaguni in boats if China attacked Taiwan. Tokyo, they said, has no plan to deal with them, and locals' pleas for help have gone unanswered.翻译:在接受路透社采访时，二十多名现任和前任日本官员和居民表示，如果中国攻击台湾，数百甚至数千名难民可能会试图乘船抵达与那国岛。他们说，东京没有处理这些问题的计划，当地人的求助请求也没有得到回应。

"It's like their mouths are taped shut," said Yonaguni mayor Kenichi Itokazu, referring to the central government. Pinned to a noticeboard at his town hall was a list of typhoons and other crises to have visited the island, including the arrival of the Vietnamese.翻译:与那国市市长糸一健一（Kenichi Itokazu）说：“他们的嘴就像被胶带封住了。”他指的是中央政府。他的市政厅的布告栏上贴着一份台风和其他访问该岛的危机的清单，其中包括越南人的到来。

Itokazu said he had appealed for help directly to Japan's Chief Cabinet Secretary Hirokazu Matsuno when he came to Yonaguni in July, but again got no response.翻译:伊藤一说，他7月来到与那国时曾直接向日本内阁官房长官松野博和求助，但再次没有得到回应。

Some U.S. officials say China may be ready to invade Taiwan by 2027. Chinese leader Xi Jinping told U.S. President Joe Biden last month that no such plan exists, but he is raising pressure on Taiwan ahead of a Jan. 13 presidential election that Vice President Lai Ching-te, who Beijing views as a separatist, is tipped to win.翻译:一些美国官员表示，中国可能已准备好在 2027 年入侵台湾。中国领导人习近平上个月告诉美国总统乔·拜登，不存在这样的计划，但他在 1 月 13 日总统大选之前向台湾施加压力，赖副总统表示北京将其视为分裂分子的正德有望获胜。

Taiwan's foreign ministry declined to address questions about whether it had discussed humanitarian contingencies with Japan, but said Taipei would not act rashly or succumb to Chinese coercion.翻译:台湾外交部拒绝回答有关是否与日本讨论人道主义紧急情况的问题，但表示台北不会轻举妄动或屈服于中国的胁迫。

A spokesperson for Japan's Cabinet Secretariat said that "if large numbers of refugees came to Japan, relevant government departments would work together to respond".翻译:日本内阁官房发言人表示，“如果大量难民涌入日本，政府相关部门将共同应对”。

He declined to comment on whether there was a specific plan for Yonaguni and said he did not know whether the island's mayor had directly asked Matsuno for help.

CRISIS SCENARIO

The people who spoke to Reuters included nine current and six former officials with knowledge of Japan's emergency planning, some of whom spoke on the condition of anonymity because they were not authorised to comment publicly.翻译:接受路透社采访的人士包括了解日本应急计划的九名现任官员和六名前任官员，其中一些人要求匿名，因为他们无权公开发表评论。

They said that while Taiwanese refugees could flee to Japan by sea, the nature of any conflict and the numbers who would come were hard to predict. Japan's government has made no public mention of such a scenario.翻译:他们表示，虽然台湾难民可以通过海路逃往日本，但任何冲突的性质以及前来的人数都很难预测。日本政府没有公开提及这种情况。

"There could be hundreds of boats, too many even for a Chinese blockade to stop," a Japan Coast Guard official said. The Cabinet Secretariat, headed by Prime Minister Fumio Kishida and run by Matsuno, is responsible for devising a plan, he added.翻译:日本海岸警卫队的一名官员表示：“可能有数百艘船只，数量太多，即使中国的封锁也无法阻止。”他补充说，由首相岸田文雄领导、松野主持的内阁秘书处负责制定计划。

The current and former officials described a government focused on its military build-up rather than a complex humanitarian response plan encompassing the multiple departments, local authorities and companies that would have to screen, transport, feed and house possibly more refugees than Japan has ever encountered.翻译:现任和前任官员表示，政府专注于军事建设，而不是涵盖多个部门、地方当局和公司的复杂的人道主义应对计划，这些计划必须筛查、运输、喂养和安置可能比日本遇到的更多的难民。

Around 18,000 refugees were in Japan in 2022, mostly from Myanmar, according to the Migration Policy Institute, which cited United Nations figures that apply a broader definition than Japan's government. Amid conflict in Europe and the Middle East, Germany had more than 2 million and Poland almost a million, many from Ukraine.翻译:根据移民政策研究所的数据，2022 年约有 18,000 名难民来到日本，其中大部分来自缅甸，该研究所引用的联合国数据比日本政府的定义更广泛。在欧洲和中东的冲突中，德国有超过 200 万人，波兰有近 100 万人，其中许多来自乌克兰。

Tokyo has a political decision to make on whether to accept significant numbers of refugees, said Kevin Maher at NMV Consulting in Washington, who was previously head of Japan affairs at the State Department.翻译:华盛顿 NMV 咨询公司前国务院日本事务负责人凯文·马赫 (Kevin Maher) 表示，东京需要就是否接受大量难民做出政治决定。

"Japan has been reluctant to let in large numbers but, whatever the policy may be, the reality is that just about anything that floats could be headed for Japan," Maher said.

A BIG JOB

General Yoshihide Yoshida, the head of Japan's Self-Defense Forces (SDF), said he witnessed the refugee crisis caused by Russia's attack on Ukraine when he visited Poland last year.翻译:日本自卫队司令吉田芳秀大将表示，去年访问波兰时亲眼目睹了俄罗斯袭击乌克兰引发的难民危机。

"If something similar happened near us we would have to offer the same kind of humanitarian response, but that shouldn't be left to the SDF, it's for the whole of government to consider thoroughly," he said on Tokunoshima, at the eastern end of the island chain that includes Yonaguni, where he was observing beach landing drills by Japanese forces on Nov. 19.翻译:他在东端的德之岛表示：“如果类似的事情发生在我们附近，我们将不得不提供同样的人道主义反应，但这不应该留给自卫队，而应该由整个政府来彻底考虑。” 11 月 19 日，他在包括与那国岛在内的岛链上观察日军的海滩登陆演习。

That day, Taiwan detected Chinese aircraft over the Taiwan Strait and spotted warships carrying out combat readiness patrols.翻译:当天，台湾在台海发现中国飞机，并发现军舰进行战备巡逻。

The roughly 200 SDF troops on Yonaguni could be among the first to respond to any refugee crisis should East Asia, as Kishida warned last year, become the next Ukraine.翻译:正如岸田去年警告的那样，一旦东亚成为下一个乌克兰，驻扎在与那国岛的大约 200 名自卫队士兵可能会成为第一批应对难民危机的部队之一。

But in more than 100 pages of documents outlining Kishida's military build-up, refugees are mentioned only once, in a general reference to working with the U.N.翻译:但在 100 多页概述岸田军事建设的文件中，难民只被提及一次，泛指与联合国的合作

Tokyo will hesitate to implement specific humanitarian plans on Yonaguni because it could lead China into believing Japan is preparing for a Taiwan conflict, said a U.S. official with knowledge of Japanese thinking, speaking on the condition of anonymity because he was not authorised to comment publicly.翻译:一位了解日本想法的美国官员表示，东京将犹豫是否在与那国岛实施具体的人道主义计划，因为这可能会让中国认为日本正在为台湾冲突做准备。该官员要求匿名，因为他无权公开发表评论。

Even if he had a refugee plan, Kishida would still face an obstacle: his contentious relationship with the Okinawa government that administers Yonaguni.翻译:即使有难民计划，岸田仍然面临一个障碍：他与管理与那国岛的冲绳政府之间存在争议的关系。

The governor, Denny Tamaki, wants fewer U.S. troops based in his prefecture, opposes Kishida's military expansion and says it is the prime minister's job to manage migrants arriving by boat.翻译:知事丹尼·玉木希望减少驻扎在该县的美军，反对岸田的军事扩张，并表示管理乘船抵达的移民是首相的职责。

"Even if it's left to local government, the authority and financial resources for this have not yet been clearly defined," he said in an interview. Resentment with Tokyo lingers in Okinawa over the deaths of one in four islanders in World War Two and the substantial military presence that has been there since.翻译:“即使交给地方政府，这方面的权限和财政资源也尚未明确，”他在接受采访时表示。冲绳岛民因二战期间四分之一的岛民死亡以及此后在冲绳岛驻扎的大量军事力量而对东京心存不满。

In March, Okinawa and Tokyo officials conducted their first tabletop drill to simulate the evacuation of around 120,000 residents and tourists on Japan's southwestern islands, including Yonaguni, calculating the operation would take about a week.翻译:今年3月，冲绳和东京官员进行了首次桌面演习，模拟疏散包括与那国岛在内的日本西南部岛屿上约12万名居民和游客，计算行动大约需要一周时间。

"There is no guarantee people won't come from Taiwan and it would overwhelm the system," said one of the drill's advisers, Hironobu Nakabayashi from Kokushikan University's Research Institute of Disaster Management and Emergency Medical System.

NOT ENOUGH TO SHARE

Back in Yonaguni, resident Satoshi Nagahama, 33, was surprised to learn the government had no humanitarian plan for refugees.翻译:回到与那国岛，33 岁的居民 Satoshi Nagahama 惊讶地发现政府没有针对难民的人道主义计划。

"I don't think we could handle any. The government would have to take them elsewhere," he said at the island's closest port to Taiwan, where he was hauling blue marlin from fishing boats and packing them in ice.翻译:“我认为我们无法处理任何东西。政府必须将它们带到其他地方，”他在岛上距离台湾最近的港口说，在那里他从渔船上拖出蓝马林鱼并将其包装在冰中。

Even the community centre that temporarily housed the Vietnamese refugees Sakihara found has been closed for a decade, its crumbling concrete walls draped in green netting.翻译:就连咲原发现的越南难民临时居住的社区中心也已关闭十年，其摇摇欲坠的混凝土墙覆盖着绿色的网。

Without government help, some residents say it would fall to the island's two police officers or town hall officials including Koji Sugama, a 65-year-old former soldier, to handle any refugee crisis.翻译:一些居民表示，如果没有政府的帮助，处理难民危机的责任将落在岛上的两名警察或市政厅官员身上，其中包括 65 岁的退伍军人菅间浩二 (Koji Sugama)。

Since he was hired in April to improve disaster management, one of Sugama's tasks has been procuring emergency supplies for residents, including bottled water and ready meals packed into three heavy steel containers dotted around the island.翻译:自从四月份受聘改善灾害管理以来，Sugama 的任务之一就是为居民采购应急物资，包括瓶装水和即食食品，装在分布在岛上的三个重型钢制集装箱中。

"This will do for one, maybe two days," he said, standing inside one of them. "There isn't enough to share."翻译:“这可以持续一到两天，”他站在其中一间里面说道。 “没有足够的东西可以分享。”

item.title: 中国表示免签旅行政策促进了旅游业
item.description:
China's foreign ministry said on Tuesday its visa-free travel policy has produced a clear effect, making things easier for travellers.翻译:中国外交部周二表示，免签旅行政策已产生明显效果，为游客提供了便利。

"Going forward, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will continue to adjust visa policies to create more favourable conditions and further facilitate cross-border travel," spokesperson Wang Wenbin told a press briefing when asked for an update on tourism after China announced the policy, which covers several European countries and Malaysia.翻译:“下一步，外交部将继续调整签证政策， 创造更多便利条件，进一步便利跨境旅游。”覆盖多个欧洲国家和马来西亚。

The policy came into effect Dec. 1 and the ministry, citing immigration data, said about 7,000 of nearly 18,000 travellers from France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Malaysia - the countries covered by the visa waiver - entered China in the first three days of the month.翻译:该政策于 12 月 1 日生效，商务部援引出入境数据称，来自法国、德国、意大利、荷兰、西班牙和马来西亚等免签国家的近 18,000 名旅客中，约有 7,000 人首次入境中国。该月的三天。

Daily average tourist numbers from those countries have risen by 39% on the first three days of December compared to on the last day of November, Wang said.翻译:王说，与11月最后一天相比，12月前三天来自这些国家的日均游客人数增加了39%。

Germany's ambassador to China had expressed hope that China would extend the measures to all European Union members.翻译:德国驻华大使曾表示希望中国将这些措施扩大到所有欧盟成员国。

item.title: 复兴的莫斯科汽车品牌跻身俄罗斯前十
item.description:
Russia's Soviet-era Moskvich car entered the country's list of top 10 best-selling brands for the first time in November, data from Russian analytical agency Autostat showed on Tuesday.翻译:俄罗斯分析机构 Autostat 周二的数据显示，俄罗斯苏联时期的 Moskvich 汽车于 11 月份首次进入该国十大最畅销品牌排行榜。

November sales of new passenger cars in Russia increased by 113% year on year to 109,706 vehicles, Autostat said, citing data from its partner PPK. Sales are rebounding from a slump caused by sanctions and the departure of Western carmakers in 2022.翻译:Autostat援引其合作伙伴PPK的数据称，11月份俄罗斯新乘用车销量同比增长113%，达到109,706辆。 2022 年，制裁和西方汽车制造商退出导致销量下滑，销量正在反弹。

Production of the Moskvich was relaunched this year at a plant in Moscow. The Russian state purchased the factory from Renault (RENA.PA) last year for a symbolic one rouble as the French carmaker left the market after Moscow's invasion of Ukraine.翻译:今年，莫斯科工厂重新启动了“Moskvich”的生产。去年，俄罗斯政府以象征性的一卢布从雷诺(RENA.PA)手中购买了这家工厂，因为这家法国汽车制造商在莫斯科入侵乌克兰后退出了市场。

Sources have told Reuters that the Moskvich 3 model is a JAC Sehol X4 assembled in Moscow using kits purchased from a Chinese partner.翻译:消息人士告诉路透社，Moskvich 3 车型是一辆 JAC Sehol X4，使用从中国合作伙伴购买的套件在莫斯科组装。

The Moskvich was ninth in the list of best-selling cars in November, having sold 1,910 for a 1.7% share of the market. Over the 11 months from January to November, 10,676 Moskvich cars were sold, the data showed.翻译:Moskvich 在 11 月份最畅销汽车排行榜中排名第九，售出 1,910 辆，市场份额为 1.7%。数据显示，从 1 月到 11 月的 11 个月里，莫斯科汽车共售出 10,676 辆。

Lada, Russia's most popular car, led the way in November with 32,651 cars sold and a market share of 29.8%. Chinese cars hold most of the other positions on the list, replacing departing European and Japanese brands.翻译:俄罗斯最受欢迎的汽车拉达 (Lada) 11 月份销量领先，销量为 32,651 辆，市场份额为 29.8%。中国汽车占据了榜单上的大部分其他位置，取代了即将退出的欧洲和日本品牌。

Chinese car sales appear to have peaked at more than 56% of the market as Russia's domestic production recovers after the exodus of Western automakers, Autustat data shows.翻译:Autustat数据显示，随着西方汽车制造商撤离后俄罗斯国内产量复苏，中国汽车销量似乎已达到市场峰值，占市场份额的56%以上。

According to Autostat, there were 939,254 new passenger cars sold in Russia in the past 11 months, up almost 65% year on year.翻译:根据Autostat的数据，过去11个月俄罗斯销售了939,254辆新乘用车，同比增长近65%。

item.title: 中国蓝箭航天准备用甲烷燃料火箭发射卫星
item.description:
Beijing-based LandSpace Technology, one of China's private space companies, is preparing to launch satellite payloads to orbit in a key commercial test of its methane and liquid oxygen fuelled rocket.翻译:总部位于北京的蓝箭航天科技有限公司是中国私营航天公司之一，该公司正准备将卫星有效载荷送入轨道，对其甲烷和液氧燃料火箭进行一项重要的商业测试。

Investors and rocket developers have said methane could offer a way to help slash costs and support reusable rockets in a cleaner and more efficient manner.翻译:投资者和火箭开发商表示，甲烷可以提供一种帮助削减成本并以更清洁、更高效的方式支持可重复使用火箭的方法。

LandSpace's Zhuque-2 carrier rocket was transferred to the launch area of a space facility in the Gobi Desert on Friday and is readying for launch, designated Y-3, the company said on its Weibo social media account.翻译:蓝箭航天在其微博社交媒体账户上表示，朱雀二号运载火箭已于周五转移至戈壁沙漠的航天设施发射区，并准备发射，代号为Y-3。

The company did not specify a launch window for the rocket, which will blast off from Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in Inner Mongolia.翻译:该公司没有具体说明火箭的发射窗口，该火箭将从内蒙古酒泉卫星发射中心发射。

LandSpace aims to prove the feasibility of Zhuque-2 with three test launches; the first two were Y-1 and Y-2, a company representative said on Tuesday.翻译:蓝箭航天旨在通过三次发射验证朱雀二号的可行性；公司代表周二表示，前两个是 Y-1 和 Y-2。

If Zhuque-2 is validated, LandSpace plans to provide clients about three launches in 2024 and double that number in 2025, the representative said.翻译:该代表表示，如果“朱雀二号”获得验证，蓝箭航天计划在 2024 年为客户提供约 3 次发射，并在 2025 年将这一数字增加一倍。

LandSpace declined to provide details on the launch date or the number and type of the satellites to be carried by Y-3.翻译:蓝箭航天拒绝透露发射日期或运三号运载卫星的数量和类型的详细信息。

Chinese commercial space firms have rushed into the sector since 2014, when the government allowed private investment in an industry now dominated by Elon Musk's SpaceX.翻译:自 2014 年以来，中国商业航天公司纷纷涌入该领域，当时政府允许私人投资该行业，目前该行业由埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX 主导。

LandSpace was one of the earliest and best funded of the Chinese space startups aiming to tap into the demand for rocket launches amid growing competition to place satellites in low-Earth orbit as an alternative to Musk's Starlink.翻译:蓝箭航天是中国最早、资金最充足的航天初创公司之一，旨在满足火箭发射的需求，因为将卫星送入近地轨道以替代马斯克的星链的竞争日益激烈。

In July, LandSpace hit a benchmark in that race with the launch of the world's first methane-liquid oxygen rocket, the Zhuque-2 Y-2, putting China ahead of U.S. rivals including SpaceX and Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin.翻译:7月，蓝箭航天在这场竞赛中创下了基准，发射了世界上第一枚甲烷液氧火箭“朱雀二号Y-2”，使中国领先于包括SpaceX和杰夫·贝索斯的蓝色起源在内的美国竞争对手。

Before Y-2, which didn't carry a usable satellite, LandSpace said that Zhuque-2 Y-1, the first test rocket, failed a launch last year, without specifying whether it carried any satellite payloads.翻译:在运二号没有携带可用卫星之前，蓝箭航天表示，第一枚试验火箭朱雀二号运一号去年发射失败，但没有具体说明它是否携带任何卫星有效载荷。

Founded in 2015, LandSpace has secured funding from investors including venture capital firm HongShan, known at that time as Sequoia Capital China, the investment arm of Chinese property developer Country Garden and the state-backed China SME Development Fund.翻译:蓝箭空间成立于 2015 年，已获得投资者的融资，包括风险投资公司红杉资本（当时称为红杉资本中国）、中国房地产开发商碧桂园的投资部门以及国家支持的中国中小企业发展基金。

LandSpace's latest announced fundraising was in 2020, when it raised 1.2 billion yuan ($168.14 million). The company has had fundraising rounds of undisclosed sizes since, Chinese company record tracking database Tianyancha showed.翻译:蓝箭航天最新宣布的融资是在 2020 年，当时筹集了 12 亿元人民币（1.6814 亿美元）。中国公司记录追踪数据库天眼查显示，自此以来，该公司已进行过几轮未公开融资规模的融资。

In July, LandSpace founder and CEO Zhang Changwu told Chinese publication Yicai the company had started developing reusable rockets and expected to conduct a test launch in the second half of 2025.翻译:今年7月，蓝箭航天创始人兼首席执行官张昌武告诉第一财经，该公司已开始研发可重复使用火箭，预计于2025年下半年进行试射。

LandSpace rival OrienSpace, founded in 2020, said it plans to launch its first solid-fuel rocket, Gravity-1, in December.翻译:LandSpace 的竞争对手 OrienSpace 成立于 2020 年，表示计划于 12 月发射第一枚固体燃料火箭 Gravity-1。

($1 = 7.1368 yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1368 元）

item.title: 随着焦点转向美国就业，亚洲股市下滑
item.description:
Asian stocks slipped to three-week lows and Hong Kong's unloved Hang Seng index slumped to a one-year trough on Tuesday while bonds and the dollar steadied as investors tempered expectations for cuts to U.S. interest rates and waited on U.S. jobs data.翻译:周二，亚洲股市跌至三周低点，香港恒生指数跌至一年低点，而债券和美元则企稳，因为投资者降低了对美国降息的预期，并等待美国就业数据。

The Australian dollar fell 0.6% after the central bank left interest rates on hold, as expected, and emphasised that the future direction rates would depend on data.翻译:央行如预期维持利率不变，并强调未来利率方向将取决于数据，澳元下跌0.6%。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was down 1% in late afternoon trade, with Hong Kong doing most of the dragging with a 1.6% fall.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)在午后交易中下跌 1%，其中香港股市跌幅最大，跌幅为 1.6%。

The Hang Seng (.HSI) is down more than 17% for the year so far, while world stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) are up almost 15%, as investors have streamed out of Chinese assets while the economy stumbles.翻译:恒生指数(.HSI)今年迄今已下跌超过 17%，而世界股市(.MIWD00000PUS)则上涨近 15%，原因是投资者在经济陷入困境时纷纷撤离中国资产。

Japan's Nikkei (.N225) was 1.4% lower at three-week trough, mostly thanks to falling chipmaking stocks. S&P 500 futures fell 0.2% and European futures were flat.翻译:日本日经指数(.N225)在三周低点下跌 1.4%，主要是由于芯片制造股下跌。标准普尔 500 指数期货下跌 0.2%，欧洲期货持平。

Gold hung on above $2,000 after a wild session on Monday, when it hit a record high in Asia before recoiling sharply lower.翻译:周一经历了疯狂的交易后，金价维持在 2,000 美元上方，当时金价在亚洲创下历史新高，随后大幅回落。

"The market has more or less priced the soft landing scenario (for the U.S. economy) to perfection," said Bank of Singapore strategist Moh Siong Sim. "Overnight there was a bit of a reality check -- maybe it was too ambitious."翻译:新加坡银行策略师 Moh Siong Sim 表示：“市场或多或少已经将（美国经济）软着陆情景定价为完美。” “一夜之间，我们对现实进行了一些检验——也许它太过雄心勃勃了。”

Treasuries had come under a little pressure on Monday as traders calibrated pretty aggressive pricing for U.S. interest rate cuts. Two-year yields rose 9.1 basis points (bps) and were steady at 4.62% in Asia trade.翻译:由于交易员为美国降息调整了相当激进的定价，美国国债周一承受了一些压力。亚洲贸易中，两年期收益率上升 9.1 个基点 (bps)，稳定在 4.62%。

Having been encouraged by a benign inflation report three weeks ago, futures imply about 125 bps of cuts in 2024.翻译:受到三周前良性通胀报告的鼓舞，期货暗示 2024 年将降息约 125 个基点。

U.S. job openings data is due at 1530 GMT, and broader hiring figures, which had last month showed signs of a slowdown in the job market, will be published on Friday.翻译:美国职位空缺数据将于格林尼治标准时间 1530 公布，上个月显示就业市场放缓迹象的更广泛的招聘数据将于周五公布。

"While it's understandable the market has embraced the recent improvement in inflation and softer October labour market data, strong momentum in the economy remains," ANZ analysts said in a note to clients.翻译:澳新银行分析师在给客户的一份报告中表示，“尽管市场接受近期通胀改善和十月份劳动力市场数据疲软的情况是可以理解的，但经济的强劲势头仍然存在。”

"We therefore expect that the (Fed), while encouraged by recent inflation improvements, will continue to adopt a hawkish policy stance."

DOVISH RBA

In currency markets, the dollar, which suffered its sharpest monthly decline for a year in November, rose slightly overnight.翻译:货币市场方面，美元在11月份遭遇一年来最大月度跌幅，但隔夜小幅上涨。

The euro sat at $1.0841 on Tuesday, just above support at its 200-day moving average.翻译:欧元周二报1.0841美元，略高于200日移动均线的支撑位。

Core inflation in Tokyo slowed in November, though the yen strengthened a little to 146.88 per dollar.翻译:11 月份东京核心通胀 放缓，但日元兑美元小幅走强至 146.88。

The Australian and New Zealand dollars retreated from multi-month highs on Monday.翻译:澳元和新西兰元周一从数月高点回落。

They were last a little weaker, with the Aussie dropping to $0.6583, where it was testing support at its 200-day moving average.翻译:最后走势稍弱，澳元跌至 0.6583 美元，正在测试 200 日移动均线的支撑位。

The Reserve Bank of Australia left interest rates on hold and said, as it had a month ago, that future rate settings would depend on data.翻译:澳大利亚储备银行维持利率不变，并表示与一个月前一样，未来的利率设定将取决于数据。

"We suspect that markets were expecting a more hawkish statement given the unusually long time before the next RBA meeting on 6 February," said Lenny Jin, global FX strategist at HSBC.翻译:汇丰银行全球外汇策略师 Lenny Jin 表示：“鉴于距离 2 月 6 日下一次澳洲联储会议召开的时间异常漫长，我们怀疑市场正在期待一份更加鹰派的声明。”

"The RBA did not forcefully push against the ongoing trend of easing financial conditions that has occurred globally since November."翻译:“自11月以来，澳洲联储并没有强力阻止全球金融环境持续宽松的趋势。”

Falling coal and gas prices pushed Australia's current account into deficit in the September quarter, data on Tuesday showed.翻译:周二的数据显示，煤炭和天然气价格下跌导致澳大利亚九月季度经常账户出现赤字。

In commodity trading, Brent crude futures traded broadly steady at $78.07 a barrel, having fallen overnight on doubts that producers will make further cuts to output.翻译:在大宗商品交易中，布伦特原油期货交易大致稳定在每桶 78.07 美元，因对生产商将进一步减产的怀疑而隔夜下跌。

Chicago wheat held near its highest level since late August after the U.S. Department of Agriculture confirmed the largest one-off private sale to China in years.翻译:在美国农业部确认了多年来对中国最大的一次私人出售后，芝加哥小麦价格维持在接近八月下旬以来的最高水平。

Dalian iron ore futures declined amid lingering fears of China's intervention, though analysts cautioned that the downward trend may be short-lived.翻译:由于对中国干预的担忧挥之不去，大连铁矿石期货下跌，不过分析师警告称，下跌趋势可能是短暂的。

item.title: 报告称，2023 年全球化石燃料二氧化碳排放量将创历史新高
item.description:
Global carbon dioxide emissions from burning fossil fuels are set to hit a record high this year, exacerbating climate change and fuelling more destructive extreme weather, scientists said.翻译:科学家表示，燃烧化石燃料造成的全球二氧化碳排放量今年将创下历史新高，加剧气候变化并助长更具破坏性的极端天气。

The Global Carbon Budget report, published on Tuesday during the COP28 climate summit, said that overall CO2 emissions, which reached a record high last year, have plateaued in 2023 due to a slight drop from uses of land like deforestation.翻译:周二在COP28 气候峰会期间发布的《全球碳预算》报告称，由于森林砍伐等土地使用略有下降，去年创下历史新高的二氧化碳排放总量已于 2023 年趋于稳定。

Countries are expected to emit a total 36.8 billion metric tons of CO2 from fossil fuels in 2023, a 1.1% increase from last year, the report by scientists from more than 90 institutions including the University of Exeter concluded.翻译:来自埃克塞特大学等 90 多家机构科学家的报告得出结论，到 2023 年，各国化石燃料二氧化碳排放量预计将达到 368 亿吨，比去年增加 1.1%。

When land use emissions are included, global CO2 emissions are set to total 40.9 billion tons this year.翻译:如果算上土地使用排放，今年全球二氧化碳排放总量预计将达到 409 亿吨。

Emissions from coal, oil and gas all rose, driven by India and China. The Chinese rise was caused by its economy reopening after COVID-19 lockdowns, while India's was a result of power demand growing faster than the country's renewable energy capacity, leaving fossil fuels to make up the shortfall.翻译:在印度和中国的推动下，煤炭、石油和天然气的排放量均有所上升。中国的崛起是由于新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 封锁后经济重新开放所致，而印度的崛起是由于电力需求增长快于该国可再生能源产能，导致化石燃料弥补了缺口。

The year's emissions trajectory pulls the world further away from preventing global warming exceeding 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial times.翻译:今年的排放轨迹使世界距离防止全球变暖较工业化前时期超过 1.5 摄氏度又进一步。

"It now looks inevitable we will overshoot the 1.5C target of the Paris Agreement," said Exeter's Professor Pierre Friedlingstein, who led the research.翻译:领导这项研究的埃克塞特大学教授皮埃尔·弗里德林斯坦 (Pierre Friedlingstein) 表示：“现在看来，我们不可避免地会超出《巴黎协定》规定的 1.5 摄氏度目标。”

Countries agreed in the 2015 Paris Agreement to keep warming well below 2C and to aim for 1.5C. Scientists have said more than 1.5C will unleash more severe and irreversible impacts including fatal heat, catastrophic floods, and the death of coral reefs.翻译:各国在 2015 年《巴黎协定》中同意将升温幅度控制在远低于 2 摄氏度，并力争达到 1.5 摄氏度。科学家表示，超过 1.5 摄氏度将带来更严重且不可逆转的影响，包括致命的高温、灾难性的洪水和珊瑚礁的死亡。

"Leaders meeting at COP28 will have to agree rapid cuts in fossil fuel emissions even to keep the 2C target alive," Friedlingstein said.翻译:Friedlingstein 表示：“在 COP28 会议上举行的领导人会议必须就快速削减化石燃料排放达成一致，即使是为了保持 2C 目标的实现。”

The IPCC, the U.N.'s climate science panel, has said world emissions must plummet 43% by 2030, to stick to the 1.5C limit.翻译:联合国气候变化专门委员会（IPCC）表示，到 2030 年，世界排放量必须下降 43%，才能遵守 1.5 摄氏度的限制。

Instead, emissions have charged higher in recent years. The COVID-19 pandemic caused a brief blip in that trend, but emissions are now back up to 1.4% above pre-COVID levels.翻译:相反，近年来排放量更高。 COVID-19 大流行导致这一趋势短暂中断，但排放量目前已较新冠疫情前的水平回升至 1.4%。

Researchers from the Helsinki-based Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA) said last month China's greenhouse emissions could start going into "structural decline" as early as next year due to record-high renewable energy installations.翻译:赫尔辛基能源与清洁空气研究中心（CREA）的研究人员上个月表示，由于可再生能源装机量创历史新高，中国的温室气体排放最早可能在明年开始进入“ 结构性下降”。

China produces 31% of global fossil fuel CO2 emissions.翻译:中国的化石燃料二氧化碳排放量占全球的 31%。

The new report cited some bright spots, with emissions in the U.S. and European Union both falling, driven in part by coal plants being retired.翻译:新报告列举了一些亮点，美国和欧盟的排放量均下降，部分原因是燃煤电厂退役。

Overall, 26 countries representing 28% of the world's emissions are now in a downward trend. Most are in Europe, the researchers said.翻译:总体而言，占世界排放量 28% 的 26 个国家目前正处于下降趋势。研究人员表示，大多数都在欧洲。

  • 亚洲清洁能源发展速度快于西方
  • 亚洲电力行业排放量仍在上升
  • 亚洲削减份额，西方加强燃气发电
  • 印度认为没有储能就无法实现能源转型

Asia boosted clean electricity output and slashed its share of fossil fuels faster than North America and Europe from 2015, data shows, underscoring resistance by Asian nations to a western push to choke private financing for coal-fired power.翻译:数据显示，从2015年开始，亚洲提高清洁电力产量并削减化石燃料份额的速度快于北美和欧洲，这凸显了亚洲国家对西方遏制燃煤发电私人融资的抵制。

There is wide agreement that increasing clean power, such as wind and solar, is central to curbing carbon emissions to fight climate change. On Saturday at the U.N. climate summit, 118 governments, led by the U.S. and the European Union, pledged to triple the world's renewable energy capacity by 2030.翻译:人们普遍认为，增加风能和太阳能等清洁能源对于遏制碳排放、应对气候变化至关重要。周六在联合国气候峰会上，以美国和欧盟为首的 118 个国家政府承诺到 2030 年将全球可再生能源产能增加两倍。

However, China and India did not back the COP28 pledge as it was twinned with curbing use of fossil fuels, which they see as essential to reliably meeting rapidly rising power demand.翻译:然而，中国和印度并未支持 COP28 的承诺，因为该承诺与限制化石燃料的使用有关，他们认为化石燃料对于可靠地满足快速增长的电力需求至关重要。

Bolstering their view, even with coal, higher financing costs and weaker access to funds, Asia outpaced Europe and North America in fighting climate change by key measures since the Paris climate agreement of 2015, a Reuters analysis of data found.翻译:路透社对数据的分析发现，尽管存在煤炭、较高的融资成本和较弱的资金获取渠道，但自 2015 年巴黎气候协议以来，亚洲在应对气候变化方面的关键措施仍超过了欧洲和北美，这支持了他们的观点。

Asia boosted clean power, including hydro and nuclear, as a share of overall power output by about 8 percentage points to 32% between 2015 and 2022, a review of data from energy think tank Ember showed.翻译:能源智库 Ember 的数据审查显示，2015 年至 2022 年间，亚洲推动了包括水电和核电在内的清洁能源发电，占总发电量的比例提高了约 8 个百分点，达到 32%。

By comparison, clean energy's share in the power mix in Europe rose over 4 percentage points to 55%, while in North America it climbed by more than 6 percentage points to 46%.翻译:相比之下，欧洲清洁能源在电力结构中的份额上升了4个百分点以上，达到55%，而在北美则上升了6个多百分点，达到46%。

"There cannot be any pressure on India to cut down emissions," India's power and renewable energy minister R.K. Singh said on Nov. 30.翻译:印度电力和可再生能源部长RK辛格11月30日表示，“不能对印度施加任何减排压力。”

Asia slashed the share of fossil fuels in power generation by 8 percentage points to 68% in 2022 from 2015, abating more gas and coal use than Europe and North America.翻译:亚洲将比 2015 年化石燃料在发电中的份额削减 8 个百分点，至 2022 年达到 68%，减少的天然气和煤炭使用量超过欧洲和北美。

Over the same period, Europe's dependence on fossil fuels fell 4 percentage points while North America's narrowed by 6 percentage points.翻译:同期，欧洲对化石燃料的依赖度下降了4个百分点，而北美则缩小了6个百分点。

"The data shows that the West is not moving fast enough on scaling up renewables and storage," said Hogeveen Rutter, who works with private companies on behalf of the International Solar Alliance (ISA).翻译:代表国际太阳能联盟（ISA）与私营公司合作的霍格文·鲁特（Hogeveen Rutter）表示：“数据显示，西方在扩大可再生能源和存储方面行动不够快。”

Rutter said delays in approvals for renewables, storage projects and grid interconnections in Europe and the U.S. have hampered growth of clean energy use in the West.

ASIAN EMISSIONS RISE

To be sure, fast-growing Asia, home to half the world's population, accounts for three-fifths of global emissions from power generation, including from sectors exporting goods and services to the west.翻译:可以肯定的是，快速增长的亚洲拥有世界一半的人口，其发电排放量占全球排放量的五分之三，其中包括向西方出口商品和服务的行业。

And India and China continue to build new coal-fired plants to meet rapidly growing electricity demand.翻译:印度和中国继续建设新的燃煤电厂，以满足快速增长的电力需求。

That means power generation emissions by Asia will continue to climb, after having risen nearly 4% annually since the Paris accord as electricity demand has soared, while emissions in Europe and North America declined, the Ember data showed.翻译:Ember数据显示，这意味着亚洲发电排放量将继续攀升，自《巴黎协定》签署以来，由于电力需求飙升，亚洲发电排放量每年增长近4%，而欧洲和北美的排放量则有所下降。

However, Asian governments have argued that the world's wealthiest countries should help poorer countries cut emissions, citing rich nations' higher per capita emissions and their unabated fossil fuel use in the last century.翻译:然而，亚洲各国政府认为，世界上最富裕的国家应该帮助较贫穷的国家减少排放，理由是富裕国家的人均排放量较高，而且上个世纪化石燃料的使用量有增无减。

This year, western nations expressed unwillingness to fund early retirement of polluting plants in Indonesia - the world's seventh largest coal-fired power generator, despite commitments to help it decarbonise.翻译:今年，西方国家表示不愿意为世界第七大燃煤发电厂印度尼西亚的污染工厂提前退役提供资金，尽管承诺帮助其脱碳。

"Asian countries with access to finance have been able to move much quicker, while other parts of Asia need more concessionality to catch up. This illustrates the need for the West to assist with concessional funding for storage to move away from coal," ISA's Rutter said.翻译:ISA 的 Rutter 表示：“能够获得融资的亚洲国家能够更快地采取行动，而亚洲其他地区则需要更多优惠才能迎头赶上。这说明西方需要为储能提供优惠资金，以摆脱对煤炭的依赖。”说。

Funding shortages and high-priced tariffs for renewables have hindered Indonesia's move away from coal, while access to funds have enabled rapid expansion of green energy in China, analysts say.翻译:分析人士表示，资金短缺和可再生能源高价关税阻碍了印度尼西亚摆脱煤炭的步伐，而获得资金则促进了中国绿色能源的快速扩张。

A report released on Monday estimated developing countries will need $2.4 trillion a year in investment to cap emissions.

WEST TURNS TO GAS

Some western nations are looking to curb finance for coal, calling it the "number one threat" to climate goals. Despite challenges, Asia, along with Europe and North America, have cut the share of coal in power use, although at a slower pace.翻译:一些西方国家正在寻求遏制煤炭融资，称其为气候目标的“头号威胁”。尽管面临挑战，亚洲与欧洲和北美一起削减了煤炭在电力使用中的份额，尽管步伐较慢。

However, both Europe and North America are increasing use of natural gas - often described as a transition fuel - to make up for part of the decline in coal-fired power generation, while gas makes up a shrinking share of power generation in Asia.翻译:然而，欧洲和北美都在增加天然气（通常被称为过渡燃料）的使用，以弥补燃煤发电量下降的部分影响，而天然气在亚洲发电量中所占的份额不断缩小。

The share of gas rose 3 percentage points to 26% of European power generation in 2022 from 2015, with North America boosting the share of gas-fired power by 6 percentage points to 36%, despite tepid power demand growth.翻译:到2022年，天然气在欧洲发电量中的份额将比2015年上升3个百分点，达到26%，尽管电力需求增长不温不火，北美燃气发电的份额将增加6个百分点，达到36%。

Cuts in nuclear power have slowed Europe and North America's fight to reduce emissions, although nuclear's share of their power mix remains well above Asia's.翻译:尽管核电在其电力结构中的份额仍然远高于亚洲，但核电的削减减缓了欧洲和北美减排的努力。

"The progress the West has made is to cut use of dirty coal and use relatively less-polluting gas," said Ghee Peh, an analyst at the Institute for Energy Economics and Financial Analysis.翻译:能源经济与金融分析研究所分析师 Ghee Peh 表示：“西方取得的进展是减少污染煤炭的使用，并使用污染相对较少的天然气。”

India, the world's second largest coal user, has argued for the phase-down of all fossil fuels instead of singling out coal, and plans to oppose the plan to ban private finance for coal. It wants rich nations to invest more in energy storage to back up renewables.翻译:印度是世界第二大煤炭消费国，主张逐步减少所有化石燃料，而不是单独单独使用煤炭，并计划反对禁止私人融资煤炭的计划。它希望富裕国家加大对能源存储的投资，以支持可再生能源。

"We cannot phase out fossil fuels unless we have nuclear or until storage becomes viable," Singh said.翻译:辛格说：“除非我们拥有核能或储存变得可行，否则我们无法逐步淘汰化石燃料。”

Reporting by Sudarshan Varadhan; Editing by Tony Munroe and Sonali Paul翻译:苏达山·瓦拉丹 (Sudarshan Varadhan) 报道；托尼·芒罗和索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 财新PMI显示，中国11月服务业活动在新订单的推动下加速
item.description:
China's services activity expanded at a quicker pace in November, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday, as the upturn in new businesses were the best seen for three months amid reports of firmer market conditions.翻译:周二的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 11 月份的服务业活动扩张速度更快，因为有报道称市场状况走强，新业务增长创三个月来最好水平。

The findings present a mixed picture of the vast services sector as an official survey last week showed the sector unexpectedly contracted for the first time since December last year, prompting calls for more stimulus measures.翻译:调查结果显示，庞大的服务业情况好坏参半，上周的一项官方调查显示，该行业自去年 12 月以来首次出现意外收缩，促使人们呼吁采取更多刺激措施。

The Caixin/S&P Global services purchasing managers' index (PMI) rose to a three-month high of 51.5 in November from October's 50.4, but it remained softer than the long-run series average.翻译:财新/标普全球服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）从 10 月的 50.4 升至 11 月的三个月高点 51.5，但仍低于长期系列平均水平。

"Both services supply and demand expanded, as the market continued to heal," said Wang Zhe, economist at Caixin Insight Group.翻译:财新智库经济学家王哲表示：“随着市场持续复苏，服务供给和需求均扩大。”

Taken together with the better-than-expected Caixin manufacturing PMI, Wang said the world's second-biggest economy showed signs of an encouraging recovery, with steady growth in consumer spending, solid improvement in industrial production and an uptick in market confidence.翻译:结合好于预期的财新制造业PMI ，王表示，世界第二大经济体显示出令人鼓舞的复苏迹象，消费支出稳定增长，工业生产稳步改善，市场信心回升。

Analysts say the different survey sizes and composition of surveyed companies might explain the discrepancy between the Caixin and official PMI readings.翻译:分析人士表示，不同的调查规模和受访企业的构成可能解释了财新和官方PMI数据之间的差异。

Caixin/S&P's composite PMI, which includes both manufacturing and services activity, grew to 51.6 from 50.0 in October, marking the strongest reading since August.翻译:财新/标准普尔综合 PMI（包括制造业和服务业活动）从 10 月份的 50.0 升至 51.6，创下 8 月份以来的最强读数。

Service providers were upbeat about business activity over the year ahead in November and the degree of positive sentiment picked up for the first time in five months.翻译:服务提供商对 11 月份未来一年的商业活动持乐观态度，积极情绪程度五个月来首次回升。

However, Oxford Economics lead economist Louise Loo said while China heads into 2024 with relatively loose policy settings, the country's private sector confidence was constrained by property pessimism.翻译:然而，牛津经济研究院首席经济学家Louise Loo表示，尽管中国进入2024年的政策相对宽松，但该国私营部门的信心却受到房地产悲观情绪的制约。

Property sales, investment, and home prices extended declines in October and piled more pressure on authorities to step up efforts to prevent contagion across the broader financial sector.翻译:十月份房地产销售、投资和房价继续下跌，给当局带来了更大的压力，要求当局加大力度防止疫情蔓延到更广泛的金融领域。

The country's central bank governor last week said monetary policy will remain accommodative to support growth but urged structural reforms over time to reduce the economy's reliance on infrastructure and property.翻译:该国央行行长上周表示，货币政策将保持宽松以支持增长，但敦促随着时间的推移进行结构性改革，以减少经济对基础设施和房地产的依赖。

According to the Caixin services survey, employment fell for the first time since the start of 2023 as some firms maintained a cautious approach to hiring.翻译:财新服务业调查显示，由于一些企业对招聘保持谨慎态度，就业人数出现 2023 年初以来的首次下降。

November also witnessed a further slowdown in the rate of input cost inflation across China's service sector.翻译:11月份，中国服务业投入成本通胀率进一步放缓。

"China is no longer the spender of last resort for the global economy, so don't expect robust reflation," Oxford Economics' Loo said.翻译:牛津经济研究院的卢表示：“中国不再是全球经济的最后消费国，因此不要指望出现强劲的通货再膨胀。”

Reporting by Ellen Zhang and Ryan Woo Editing by Shri Navaratnam翻译:Ellen 张和 Ryan Woo 报道 Shri Navaratnam 编辑

item.title: 外交部长表示中国希望在峰会上深化欧盟关系
item.description:
China hopes to boost relations with the European Union at an upcoming summit, with a firm focus on pragmatic cooperation in the face of complex situations and severe challenges, its foreign minister Wang Yi said.翻译:中国外交部长王毅表示，中方希望在即将举行的峰会上加强同欧盟的关系，面对复杂形势和严峻挑战，坚定不移开展务实合作。

In a meeting on Monday with EU diplomatic envoys to China in Beijing, Wang said the two sides should view bilateral relations from a strategic perspective and added that China's policy toward Europe remains stable, according to Xinhua news agency.翻译:据新华社报道，王毅周一在北京会见欧盟驻华使节时表示，双方应从战略高度看待双边关系，并表示中国对欧政策保持稳定。

"China and the EU have not completely the same point of view on international and regional issues, and only by adhering to communication and coordination can we play a constructive role in maintaining world peace and stability and addressing global challenges," Wang said, according to the Xinhua report.翻译:王毅表示，中欧在国际和地区问题上看法并不完全一致，只有坚持沟通协调，才能为维护世界和平稳定、应对全球性挑战发挥建设性作用。新华社报道。

The remarks came ahead of a highly-anticipated summit on Thursday between Chinese President Xi Jinping and President of the European Council Charles Michel and President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen.翻译:周四，中国国家主席习近平与欧洲理事会主席查尔斯·米歇尔和欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩将举行备受期待的峰会。

The two sides are trying to mend frayed relations on several trade issues, such as an EU anti-subsidy investigation on electric vehicles and a looming probe on Chinese steelmakers.翻译:双方正试图修复在多个贸易问题上的紧张关系，例如欧盟对电动汽车的反补贴调查以及即将对中国钢铁制造商进行的调查。

The head of the EU delegation to China and the envoys of EU member states to China said the EU is committed to developing constructive and stable EU-China relations, and is willing to maintain mutual respect and dialogue with China, according to the report.翻译:欧盟驻华代表团团长和欧盟成员国驻华使节表示，欧盟致力于发展建设性、稳定的欧中关系，愿同中方保持相互尊重和对话。

The envoys said the EU has no intention of decoupling from China and hopes to establish "mutually beneficial and balanced economic and trade relations with China", according to Xinhua.翻译:据新华社报道，特使们表示，欧盟无意与中国脱钩，希望与中国建立“互利、平衡的经贸关系”。

In the meeting on Monday, the two sides also exchanged views on the Ukraine crisis and Palestinian-Israeli conflict, according to the report, without elaborating.翻译:报道称，在周一的会晤中，双方还就乌克兰危机和巴以冲突交换了意见，但没有详细说明。

Reporting by Bernard Orr and Shanghai newsroom; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:伯纳德·奥尔和上海新闻编辑室的报道；索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 房屋供应短缺推动全球房价上涨步伐放缓
item.description:
Summary:
  • Reuters poll graphic on average home price change outlook:
翻译:概括：
  • 路透社平均房价变化前景的民意调查图表：

Global property prices in most major markets will rise over the next two years, albeit at a slightly slower pace than predicted three months ago as strong demand and tight supply overshadow higher interest rates, a Reuters poll found.翻译:路透调查发现，大多数主要市场的全球房地产价格将在未来两年内上涨，尽管增速略慢于三个月前的预测，因为强劲的需求和紧张的供应掩盖了利率上升的影响。

Home prices across the developed world have defied analysts' expectations, as they predicted at the start of the year prices would register double-digit falls from COVID-19-era peaks. In most markets they will end the year on a positive note.翻译:发达国家的房价超出了分析师的预期，因为他们在今年年初预测价格将比 COVID-19 时代的峰值出现两位数的下跌。在大多数市场，他们将以积极的态度结束今年。

While price rises are expected to continue into next year and 2025, higher mortgage rates and the lack of supply of affordable homes will restrict prices from rising too much.翻译:虽然价格上涨预计将持续到明年和 2025 年，但较高的抵押贷款利率和经济适用房供应不足将限制价格过度上涨。

The latest Reuters polls of over 100 housing market strategists taken between Nov. 15 and Dec. 4 showed property prices rising in five of the eight major property markets surveyed for next year and in all of them in 2025.翻译:路透社在 11 月 15 日至 12 月 4 日期间对 100 多名房地产市场策略师进行的最新民意调查显示，明年接受调查的八个主要房地产市场中，有五个市场的房价都会上涨，到 2025 年所有市场的房价都会上涨。

"Values are underpinned at the moment by the fact there's low stock availability and that is defending prices. The fact prices haven't fallen very much and actually in many markets are beginning to rise again is down to the fact the stock is very low," said Liam Bailey, head of research at Knight Frank.翻译:“目前的价值是由库存量低这一事实支撑的，这正在捍卫价格。事实上，价格没有下跌太多，而且实际上在许多市场上又开始上涨，这是因为库存非常低，莱坊研究主管利亚姆·贝利 (Liam Bailey) 表示。

"Very few vendors are bringing their properties forward into the market at the moment because they're either trying to protect their current debt costs by not moving properties and not porting their mortgages," he said.翻译:他说：“目前很少有卖家将他们的房产推向市场，因为他们要么试图通过不转移房产或不转移抵押贷款来保护当前的债务成本。”

Of the major housing markets polled - U.S., Britain, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Germany and Dubai - prices were forecast to go up between 1.3% to 5% in 2025, while estimates for India were set to surpass 7%.翻译:在接受调查的主要房地产市场（美国、英国、加拿大、澳大利亚、新西兰、德国和迪拜）中，预计 2025 年价格将上涨 1.3% 至 5%，而印度的涨幅预计将超过 7%。

That outlook was still good news for property owners who at the beginning of the year were anticipating a significant dip in value of their homes over expectations the global economy will enter a recession this year.翻译:对于业主来说，这一前景仍然是个好消息，他们在今年年初预计自己的房屋价值将大幅下跌，因为他们预期全球经济今年将陷入衰退。

But that would also mean affordability will remain a concern, especially for first-time buyers who for years have been waiting on the sidelines to get on the property ladder.翻译:但这也意味着负担能力仍将是一个令人担忧的问题，特别是对于多年来一直在观望的首次购房者来说。

Still, a strong 71% majority, 65 of 91 housing strategists, who answered an additional question said purchasing affordability for first-time homebuyers will improve over the coming year.翻译:尽管如此，在回答了另一个问题的 91 名住房策略师中，有 65 名（71%）的受访者表示，首次购房者的购买能力将在未来一年得到改善。

While many analysts, 51 of 84, who answered a separate question said the supply of affordable homes will improve over the coming two to three years, only 10 among them expected it to improve to a point where it can sufficiently address the demand.翻译:虽然回答单独问题的 84 名分析师中有 51 名表示，经济适用房的供应将在未来两到三年内有所改善，但其中只有 10 名分析师预计会改善到足以满足需求的程度。

"If you look at construction cost plus land costs, it's difficult to deliver affordable housing viably. I think lack of housing is probably likely to be a feature of most developed markets...for the medium-term (5 years)," added Knight Frank's Bailey.翻译:“如果考虑建筑成本加上土地成本，就很难提供经济适用房。我认为缺乏住房可能是大多数发达市场的一个特点......在中期（5年），”补充道莱坊的贝利。

Average U.S. home prices were seen rising 2.7% this year and 1.8% in 2024. That was higher than a September survey where prices were forecast to flat line in both years.翻译:美国平均房价预计今年将上涨 2.7%，2024 年将上涨 1.8%。这一数字高于 9 月份的调查，当时预测这两年房价将持平。

Australian home prices, which have recovered all of their 2022 losses since finding a floor in January, were expected to rise 8.0% this year and another 5.0% next year.翻译:澳大利亚房价自 1 月份触底以来已收复 2022 年的全部跌幅，预计今年将上涨 8.0%，明年将再上涨 5.0%。

New Zealand property prices were forecast to rise 4.0% next year and 5.0% in 2025 compared with expected rises of 5.0% and 6.0% in an August poll.翻译:新西兰房地产价格预计明年将上涨 4.0%，2025 年将上涨 5.0%，而 8 月份调查的预期涨幅为 5.0% 和 6.0%。

While home prices in Germany and Britain were predicted to fall 2.8% and 2.0% respectively next year, in both markets they were forecast to rise around 2-3% in 2025.翻译:虽然德国和英国的房价明年预计将分别下跌 2.8% 和 2.0%，但到 2025 年这两个市场的房价预计将上涨 2-3% 左右。

The once red-hot Canadian housing market, where prices surged about 50% during the coronavirus pandemic, is expected to stagnate in 2024 and then rise 3.3% in 2025.翻译:曾经炙手可热的加拿大房地产市场在新冠病毒大流行期间价格飙升了约 50%，预计 2024 年将陷入停滞，然后在 2025 年上涨 3.3%。

Buoyed by demand from high earners, home prices in India will beat consumer inflation to rise 6.8% this year and next.翻译:在高收入者需求的推动下，印度房价今明两年将超过消费者通胀，上涨 6.8%。

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着市场波动，澳洲联储成为焦点
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

An interest rate decision from Australia and key inflation readings from Japan and South Korea are the big market events for the Asia Pacific region on Tuesday, with investor sentiment cooled by Monday's selloff across U.S. stocks and bonds.翻译:澳大利亚的利率决定以及日本和韩国的关键通胀数据是周二亚太地区的重大市场事件，投资者情绪因周一美国股票和债券的抛售而降温。

Currencies will probably be most sensitive to the data and the Reserve Bank of Australia's guidance, while stocks could struggle to make much headway given the broad-based weakness across global equities on Monday.翻译:货币可能对数据和澳大利亚储备银行的指引最为敏感，而鉴于周一全球股市普遍疲软，股市可能难以取得太大进展。

The relative weakness of Asian equities since the pandemic, magnified by China's even more notable underperformance, has been quite something. But international investors appear to be in no rush to get back in en masse.翻译:自疫情大流行以来，亚洲股市的相对疲软，加上中国更显着的表现不佳，更是雪上加霜。但国际投资者似乎并不急于集体回归。

The RBA, meanwhile, is expected to keep its cash rate on hold at a 12-year high of 4.35%, according to 28 of 30 analysts polled by Reuters. The other two are going for a 25 basis point hike.翻译:与此同时，据路透社调查的 30 名分析师中的 28 名表示，预计澳大利亚央行将把现金利率维持在 12 年高点 4.35%。另外两个将加息 25 个基点。

Assuming the RBA does stand pat, Governor Michele Bowman's guidance will carry even greater weight. She has generally been more hawkish than her predecessor Philip Lowe, whom she replaced in September.翻译:假设澳洲联储确实坚持不变，行长米歇尔·鲍曼的指导将具有更大的影响力。总的来说，她比她于九月接任的前任菲利普·洛(Philip Lowe)更加鹰派。

The Aussie dollar spiked to a fresh four-month high of $0.6690 on Monday before closing the day lower.翻译:澳元兑美元周一飙升至四个月新高 0.6690 美元，随后收盘走低。

The Japanese yen, meanwhile, will be sensitive to the latest Tokyo inflation figures. Core consumer inflation in Japan's capital likely grew in November but at slower pace than the month before, in a sign that price pressures may be easing.翻译:与此同时，日元将对最新的东京通胀数据敏感。日本首都的核心消费者通胀 11 月份可能有所增长，但增速较上月放缓，这表明物价压力可能正在缓解。

The annual rate of inflation is expected to have eased to 2.4% from 2.7% - breathing room for the Bank of Japan, and maybe more selling pressure on the yen.翻译:年通胀率预计将从 2.7% 降至 2.4%，这为日本央行提供了喘息的空间，也可能给日元带来更大的抛售压力。

The U.S. dollar rose 0.5% on Monday against a basket of major currencies, supported by a rebound in U.S. bond yields as traders took some profits on last week's sharp rally in fixed income, especially at the short end of the curve.翻译:美元兑一篮子主要货币周一上涨0.5% ，受到美国债券收益率反弹的支撑，交易者从上周固定收益大幅上涨中获利了结，尤其是在曲线的短端。

The slump in bond yields last month weighed heavily on the dollar, which appears to have forced the hand of hedge funds and speculators - their long dollar position worth $10 billion only a couple of weeks ago has been almost fully unwound.翻译:上个月债券收益率的暴跌严重打压了美元，这似乎迫使对冲基金和投机者出手——仅在几周前，他们价值100亿美元的美元多头头寸几乎已全部平仓。

If speculators go short dollars from here, Asian currencies could benefit. The relative U.S. interest rate outlook right now fits the weaker dollar narrative - futures markets have the Fed cutting rates next year more than any major or emerging market central bank.翻译:如果投机者从这里做空美元，亚洲货币可能会受益。目前美国的相对利率前景符合美元疲软的说法——期货市场显示，美联储明年降息的幅度超过任何主要或新兴市场央行。

But will the Fed cut rates by 125 to 150 basis points next year? Maybe, but it does sound quite aggressive. And even if the Fed does go that far, other central banks are sure to lower their policy rates more than markets are currently predicting.翻译:但美联储明年会降息125至150个基点吗？也许吧，但这听起来确实很有侵略性。即使美联储确实做到了这一点，其他央行也肯定会比市场目前预测的幅度降低政策利率。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Tuesday:翻译:以下是可能为周二市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- Australia interest rate decision翻译:- 澳大利亚利率决定

- Japan - Tokyo inflation (November)翻译:- 日本 - 东京通货膨胀（十一月）

- South Korea inflation (November)翻译:- 韩国通胀（11 月）

item.title: 洞察：西方初创企业寻求打破中国对稀土精炼的控制
item.description:
Start-up tech firms are racing to transform the way rare earths are refined for the clean energy transition, a push aimed at turbocharging the West's expansion into the niche sector that underpins billions of electronic devices.翻译:初创科技公司正在竞相改变稀土精炼方式，以实现清洁能源转型，此举旨在加速西方向支撑数十亿电子设备的利基行业的扩张。

The existing standard to refine these strategic minerals, known as solvent extraction, is an expensive and dirty process that China has spent the past 30 years mastering. MP Materials (MP.N), Lynas Rare Earths (LYC.AX) and other Western rare earths companies have struggled at times to deploy it due to technical complexities and pollution concerns.翻译:提炼这些战略矿物的现有标准，即溶剂萃取，是一个昂贵且肮脏的过程，中国在过去 30 年里一直在掌握。由于技术复杂性和污染问题， MP Materials (MP.N) 、莱纳斯稀土公司(LYC.AX)和其他西方稀土公司有时很难部署它。

Rare earths are a group of 17 metals used to make magnets that turn power into motion for electric vehicles, cell phones and other electronics. While U.S. scientists helped develop solvent extraction for rare earths in the 1950s, radioactive waste from the process gradually made it unpopular in the United States.翻译:稀土是一组 17 种金属，用于制造磁铁，将电力转化为电动汽车、手机和其他电子产品的运动。虽然美国科学家在 20 世纪 50 年代帮助开发了稀土溶剂萃取法，但该过程中产生的放射性废物逐渐使其在美国不再受欢迎。

China began to rapidly expand in the industry starting during the 1980s and now controls 87% of global rare earths refining capacity, according to the International Energy Agency. That prowess has helped propel the country's economy to the second-largest in the world.翻译:据国际能源署称，中国从 20 世纪 80 年代开始在该行业迅速扩张，目前控制着全球 87% 的稀土精炼能力。这种实力帮助该国经济跃升为世界第二大经济体。

Emerging Western rivals now offer the tantalizing prospect of processing the minerals in faster, cleaner and cheaper ways, if they can successfully launch.翻译:如果新兴的西方竞争对手能够成功推出的话，他们现在将提供以更快、更清洁和更便宜的方式加工矿物的诱人前景。

"The existing rare earths refining process is a nightmare," said Isabel Barton, a mining and geological engineering professor at the University of Arizona. "That's why there are so many companies promising new methods, because we need new ones."翻译:“现有的稀土精炼工艺是一场噩梦，”亚利桑那大学采矿和地质工程教授伊莎贝尔·巴顿说。 “这就是为什么有这么多公司承诺新方法，因为我们需要新方法。”

Interviews with nearly two dozen industry consultants, academics and executives show that if one or more of these novel processing technologies succeed as hoped by 2025, they could slash reliance on Chinese rare earths technology and its toxic by-products while also bolstering plans by Western firms to charge premium prices for the strategic minerals.翻译:对近二十位行业顾问、学者和高管的采访表明，如果这些新颖的加工技术中的一种或多种在 2025 年之前取得成功，它们可以减少对中国稀土技术及其有毒副产品的依赖，同时也支持西方公司的计划对战略矿产收取溢价。

While none have launched commercially - and some industry consultants and analysts question whether they will be able to do so soon - a cadre of firms are pushing forward with aggressive development plans.翻译:虽然还没有一家公司推出商业化——而且一些行业顾问和分析师质疑他们是否能够很快这样做——但一批公司正在推进积极的开发计划。

On a former U.S. Air Force base in Louisiana, Ucore Rare Metals (UCU.V) aims to process rare earths by mid-2025 using a technology known as RapidSX that it says is at least three times faster than solvent extraction, produces no hazardous chemical waste and requires only a third of the physical space.翻译:在路易斯安那州的前美国空军基地，Ucore Rare Metals (UCU.V)的目标是到 2025 年中期使用名为 RapidSX 的技术加工稀土，据称该技术比溶剂萃取速度至少快三倍，且不产生危险化学品浪费，只需要三分之一的物理空间。

"Our goal is to re-establish a North American rare earths supply chain," Michael Schrider, Ucore's chief operating officer, said during a visit to the site.翻译:Ucore 首席运营官 Michael Schrider 在参观该工厂时表示：“我们的目标是重建北美稀土供应链。”

Formed in 2006, Ucore initially planned to mine a rare earths deposit in Alaska. But the company changed tack in 2022 to focus on refining, not mining, a pivot born from what two executives said they saw as a flaw in the West's strategy to weaken China's minerals dominance by trying to master both steps simultaneously.翻译:Ucore 成立于 2006 年，最初计划开采阿拉斯加的稀土矿床。但该公司在 2022 年改变了策略，将重点放在炼油上，而不是采矿上，这一重心源于两位高管表示，他们认为西方试图同时掌握这两个步骤来削弱中国矿产主导地位的战略存在缺陷。

Ucore, which has been testing its process with Pentagon funding, is in talks now with 17 mining companies to buy lightly processed supplies of rare earths known as concentrate, ship them to the Port of New Orleans, then truck them to a 80,800-square foot warehouse that will be outfitted with the RapidSX technology beginning in January.翻译:Ucore 一直在五角大楼的资助下测试其工艺，目前正在与 17 家矿业公司进行谈判，购买轻加工的稀土（称为精矿）供应，将其运至新奥尔良港，然后用卡车运至 80,800 平方英尺的工厂。该仓库将从一月份开始配备 RapidSX 技术。

Rare earths miners increasingly say they are content to focus on digging up rock - rather than compounding their operations with the added step of processing.翻译:越来越多的稀土矿商表示，他们满足于专注于开采岩石，而不是将其业务与额外的加工步骤相结合。

"Mining companies should focus on finding new deposits," said Luisa Moreno, president of Defense Metals (DEFN.V), which aims to open a rare earths mine in British Columbia within four years and is interested in licensing Ucore's technology. "You probably should let refining be handled by others that specialize in that."翻译:国防金属公司(DEFN.V)总裁路易莎·莫雷诺 (Luisa Moreno) 表示：“矿业公司应专注于寻找新矿床。”该公司的目标是四年内在不列颠哥伦比亚省开设一座稀土矿，并有兴趣获得 Ucore 技术的许可。 “你可能应该让其他专门从事精炼工作的人来处理。”

Rainbow Rare Earths (RBWR.L) plans by 2026 to deploy rare earths refining technology in South Africa developed by its Florida-based partner K-Technologies that uses a process known as continuous ion exchange, used by some lithium producers.翻译:Rainbow Rare Earths (RBWR.L)计划到 2026 年在南非部署由其位于佛罗里达州的合作伙伴 K-Technologies 开发的稀土精炼技术，该技术采用了一些锂生产商使用的称为连续离子交换的工艺。

Startup Aether is developing nanotechnology that programs proteins to selectively bind with and extract rare earths from ore deposits.翻译:初创公司 Aether 正在开发纳米技术，对蛋白质进行编程，使其选择性地与矿床结合并提取稀土。

In Norway, privately-held REETec says its proprietary refining process emits 90% less carbon dioxide than solvent extraction and should be operational by late 2024.翻译:在挪威，私营 REETec 表示，其专有精炼工艺的二氧化碳排放量比溶剂萃取法少 90%，预计将于 2024 年底投入运营。

And privately-held Phoenix Tailings earlier this year began refining small amounts of rare earths in Massachusetts using a process that it says is free of emissions and waste.翻译:今年早些时候，私人控股的 Phoenix Tailings 开始在马萨诸塞州使用一种据称没有排放和废物的工艺精炼少量稀土。

"There are technologies that can be developed that are far better than solvent extraction," said Robert Fox, a scientist at the U.S. Department of Energy's Idaho National Laboratory. The lab last month agreed to research new refining techniques for privately-held U.S. Critical Materials, which is developing a rare earths deposit.

SKEPTICISM

Despite the hunger for new refining techniques, industry consultants warned that manufacturers may be expecting too much and too soon from this so-far unproven group of nascent technologies, especially given the world's aggressive electrification targets.翻译:尽管渴望新的炼油技术，但行业顾问警告说，制造商可能对这组迄今为止未经证实的新兴技术期望过高且过早，特别是考虑到世界雄心勃勃的电气化目标。

Ucore's technology, for example, has never worked at commercial scale and is not expected to gain patent protection until next year, a timeline that industry consultants flagged as a cause for concern given strong rivalries for intellectual property.翻译:例如，Ucore 的技术从未在商业规模上发挥过作用，预计要到明年才能获得专利保护，鉴于知识产权竞争激烈，行业顾问将这一时间表标记为令人担忧的原因。

"The time horizon needed to develop all these new refining technologies will be longer than many expect," said Frank Fannon, a minerals industry consultant and former U.S. assistant secretary of state. Talks of production within a few years "creates a false sense of security for policymakers."翻译:矿产行业顾问、美国前助理国务卿弗兰克·范农 (Frank Fannon) 表示：“开发所有这些新炼油技术所需的时间将比许多人预期的要长。”几年内的生产谈判“给政策制定者制造了一种错误的安全感”。

Yet the need for alternatives is rising, especially in the wake of Beijing's decision earlier this year to curb exports of germanium, graphite and other metals. That has sparked concerns that rare earths could be next.翻译:然而，对替代品的需求正在上升，特别是在北京今年早些时候决定限制锗、 石墨和其他金属的出口之后。这引发了人们对稀土可能成为下一个的担忧。

Fannon and several U.S. politicians have called for Western governments to create central rare earths processing hubs, a plan already being pursued by Canada.翻译:范农和几位美国政界人士呼吁西方政府建立中央稀土加工中心，加拿大已经在实施这一计划。

In Saskatchewan, government scientists are working to launch their own rare earths processing technology after attempts to buy Chinese technology sputtered in 2020.翻译:在萨斯喀彻温省，政府科学家在 2020 年试图购买中国技术失败后，正在努力推出自己的稀土加工技术。

"We looked at existing technologies and said, 'There's a better way of doing this,'" said Mike Crabtree, CEO of the Saskatchewan Research Council (SRC), which is funded by the provincial government. "We wanted to put our own spin on it."翻译:萨斯喀彻温省研究委员会 (SRC) 由省政府资助，其首席执行官迈克·克拉布特里 (Mike Crabtree) 表示：“我们研究了现有技术并表示，‘有更好的方法可以做到这一点。’” “我们想加入我们自己的想法。”

Using artificial intelligence, the company designed processing equipment it believes is more efficient than Chinese rivals. Rather than needing up to 100 people to run, as with traditional solvent extraction, the SRC estimates that only four people will be needed to run its plant, which it hopes to open by the end of 2024.翻译:该公司利用人工智能设计了其认为比中国竞争对手更高效的处理设备。 SRC 估计只需要 4 个人来运营其工厂，而不是像传统的溶剂萃取那样需要多达 100 人来运营，该工厂希望在 2024 年底前开业。

While the SRC's goal is to spur mining across Canada, Crabtree said he is open to licensing the technology for use anywhere in the world.翻译:虽然 SRC 的目标是刺激加拿大各地的采矿业，但 Crabtree 表示，他愿意授权该技术在世界任何地方使用。

"This entire sector as a whole needs to grow outside of China in order to support the energy transition," he said.翻译:他说：“整个行业需要在中国境外发展，以支持能源转型。”

Crabtree and the SRC expect their facility to cost more to build than Chinese rivals but less to operate, a function of their desire to make processing equipment that has no waste and recycles acid and other key chemicals.翻译:Crabtree 和 SRC 预计，他们的工厂建设成本比中国竞争对手更高，但运营成本更低，因为他们希望制造无废物并回收酸和其他关键化学品的加工设备。

And while MP Materials and others have struggled to tailor their processing equipment to specific geological deposits, SRC, Ucore and others say they believe their new refining processes will be able to process the critical minerals from multiple locations across the globe.翻译:尽管 MP Materials 和其他公司一直在努力根据特定的地质矿床定制加工设备，但 SRC、Ucore 和其他公司表示，他们相信他们的新精炼工艺将能够加工来自全球多个地点的关键矿物。

"These new sources for rare earths are going to be paramount if we're going to reach global net zero targets," said Steve Schoffstall of the Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O), which holds shares in several rare earths companies.翻译:Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O) 的 Steve Schoffstall 表示：“如果我们要实现全球净零目标，这些新的稀土来源将至关重要。”Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O)持有多家稀土公司的股份。

Shares of Ucore rose more than 6% on Monday in Canadian trading after the Reuters story, while shares traded over-the-counter in the United States gained nearly 8%.翻译:路透社报道后，周一加拿大交易市场 Ucore 股价上涨逾 6%，而美国场外交易股价上涨近 8%。
