item.title: 南非阿斯彭与山德士中国达成交易进一步进军亚洲
item.description:
Aspen Pharmacare (APNJ.J) is expanding further into China through a deal to buy the Chinese business of Swiss group Sandoz (SDZ.S) for up to 92.6 million euros ($100.6 million), the South African company said on Monday.翻译:南非公司 Aspen Pharmacare (APNJ.J)周一表示，该公司正在通过以高达 9260 万欧元（1.006 亿美元）收购瑞士山德士集团(SDZ.S)中国业务的交易，进一步向中国扩张。

As part of the deal, Aspen Global Incorporated, a subsidiary of Aspen, will also buy the selling and intellectual property rights of a portfolio of established products that include Sandostatin, Aclasta and Voriconazole.翻译:作为交易的一部分，阿斯彭的子公司阿斯彭全球公司还将购买包括善宁、密固达和伏立康唑在内的一系列成熟产品的销售权和知识产权。

The rights will also cover a pipeline of products to be launched by Sandoz China in the short to medium term.翻译:这些权利还将涵盖山德士中国在中短期内推出的一系列产品。

The deal "represents an attractive opportunity for Aspen to take a major step in its stated objective of increasing its presence in China," the company said.翻译:该公司表示，此次交易“对阿斯彭来说是一个有吸引力的机会，可以在其扩大在中国业务的既定目标方面迈出重要一步”。

Aspen said it will pay up to 92.6 million euros, with 18.5 million euros contingent upon the sales performance of the products in the pipeline. The pharma giant will fund the net upfront cash from existing debt facilities.翻译:阿斯彭表示将支付高达 9260 万欧元，其中 1850 万欧元取决于正在研发的产品的销售业绩。这家制药巨头将从现有债务融资中为净预付款现金提供资金。

Additionally, Aspen will dispose of the commercialisation rights and related intellectual property for four anaesthetic products currently sold by Aspen in the European Economic Area to Sandoz.翻译:此外，阿斯彭还将向山德士处置阿斯彭目前在欧洲经济区销售的四种麻醉产品的商业化权利和相关知识产权。

For the disposal, it will receive up to 55.5 million euros, with 9.3 million euros contingent on the sales performance of its anaesthetic products, namely Nimbex, Tracrium, Carbocaine and Naropin.翻译:对于此次出售，它将获得最多 5550 万欧元，其中 930 万欧元取决于其麻醉产品 Nimbex、Tracrium、Carbocaine 和 Naropin 的销售业绩。

"The disposal will allow Aspen's European management to adopt a more focussed approach to its remaining anaesthetic products in the region," Aspen said.翻译:阿斯彭表示：“此次处置将使阿斯彭的欧洲管理层能够对其在该地区剩余的麻醉产品采取更加集中的方法。”

It added that those drugs it is selling "will be complementary to Sandoz's existing pharmaceutical offering in Europe, where it has significant scale and is well positioned to leverage their potential".翻译:该公司补充说，其销售的这些药物“将补充山德士在欧洲现有的药品产品，山德士在欧洲拥有巨大的规模，并且处于充分利用其潜力的位置”。

Aspen is targeting to add about 1.8 billion rand ($96.23 million) of annual sales to the group from the Chinese business, while the sales of the anaesthetic products during Aspen's financial year ended June 30 were about 280 million rand.翻译:阿斯彭的目标是通过中国业务为该集团增加约18亿兰特（9623万美元）的年销售额，而阿斯彭截至6月30日的财年期间麻醉产品的销售额约为2.8亿兰特。

The deals are expected to be completed in the second quarter of next year.翻译:这些交易预计将于明年第二季度完成。

item.title: 加纳法院因非法采金而入狱中国公民
item.description:
A Ghanaian court has sentenced a Chinese national to prison for illegal gold mining in the West African nation, her lawyer said on Monday, ending a case that started in 2017 and shed light on Chinese involvement in the activity.翻译:一名中国公民的律师周一表示，加纳一家法院以在西非国家非法采金罪判处一名中国公民入狱，结束了一起始于 2017 年的案件，并揭示了中国参与该活动的情况。

The court in the capital Accra sentenced Aisha Huang to four and a half years imprisonment and a fine of 48,000 Ghanaian cedis ($4,000) for running an illegal mining operation, Huang's lawyer Hope Agboado told Reuters.翻译:黄的律师霍普·阿格博阿多 (Hope Agboado) 告诉路透社，首都阿克拉的法院因非法采矿作业，判处艾莎·黄四年半监禁，并罚款 48,000 加纳塞地（4,000 美元）。

Huang, who could not be reached for comment, initially pleaded not guilty but changed her plea to guilty as the trial progressed.翻译:记者未能联系到黄某发表评论，她最初不认罪，但随着审判的进展，她改变了认罪态度。

Agboado said he had asked the court to impose a fine and deport her instead of imposing jail time. He and Huang are still deciding whether or not to appeal, he said.翻译:阿博阿多说，他已要求法院对她处以罚款并将其驱逐出境，而不是判处监禁。他说，他和黄仍在决定是否上诉。

Ghana, a gold, oil and cocoa producer, is facing a scourge of illegal mining with Chinese nationals accused of leading some of the operations that have destroyed large areas of forest, polluted water bodies and sometimes encroached on the concessions of large-scale miners.翻译:加纳是黄金、石油和可可生产国，正面临非法采矿的祸害，中国公民被指控领导了一些破坏大片森林、污染水体、有时还侵犯大型采矿者特许权的活动。

Ghana's cocoa regulator COCOBOD told Reuters in September that around 150,000 metric tons of cocoa was lost due to smuggling and illegal gold mining, locally known as galamsey, on farmlands in the 2022/23 season.翻译:加纳可可监管机构 COCOBOD 9 月告诉路透社，2022/23 产季，由于走私和农田非法采金（当地称为加拉姆西），约 15 万吨可可损失。

Huang was known as the 'Galamsey queen' in the Ghanaian press.翻译:黄被加纳媒体称为“加拉姆西女王”。

Several Chinese nationals were brought to court for similar cases in Ghana in 2021 and 2022.翻译:2021年和2022年，几名中国公民在加纳因类似案件被带上法庭。

item.title: 随着亏损和债务的增加，中国大型养猪企业纷纷进军
item.description:
The biggest pig breeders in China, consumer of fully half the world's pork, seem to have bitten off more than they can chew.翻译:中国最大的养猪企业消耗了全球一半的猪肉，但它们似乎已经吃不消了。

Big agribusinesses have elbowed their way into the sector and are rapidly modernising it, but have expanded pig herds so aggressively that, with demand now in a downturn, their hog prices are falling, losses are mounting, and debt is rising.翻译:大型农业综合企业纷纷涌入该行业，并迅速实现现代化，但其生猪存栏规模却过于激进，在需求低迷的情况下，它们的生猪价格不断下跌，损失不断增加，债务不断增加。

More huge losses are expected next year, putting China's pig enterprises under pressure to slim down their breeding herds and sell off farms, many of which are sitting empty.翻译:预计明年将出现更多巨额亏损，这将使中国养猪企业面临减少种猪存栏和出售养殖场的压力，其中许多养殖场已空置。

For now, however, they are digging in, hoping to wait out the market downturn and reap a bonanza when prices eventually recover. And that is raising the stakes, not just for themselves but for their overseas feed suppliers, genetics firms, and the struggling global pork trade.翻译:然而，目前他们正在深耕，希望等待市场低迷结束，并在价格最终回升时收获丰厚的回报。这不仅增加了他们自己的风险，也增加了他们的海外饲料供应商、基因公司和陷入困境的全球猪肉贸易的风险。

"It all comes down to how deep these companies' pockets are," said Lyle Jones, China sales director at U.S.-based Genesus Inc, which supplies breeding pigs to the leading producers.翻译:“这一切都取决于这些公司的财力有多雄厚，”美国加裕公司中国销售总监莱尔琼斯说，该公司向领先的生产商供应种猪。

Hog farming, like other Chinese sectors from homebuilding to electric vehicles, has in recent years prioritised growth and market share over profits, creating a surplus that has driven pig prices lower and is now crowding out imports.翻译:与从住宅建筑到电动汽车等中国其他行业一样，生猪养殖近年来将增长和市场份额置于利润之上，造成的盈余导致生猪价格下跌，目前正在挤出进口。

China's cash hog prices have averaged well below even the most efficient producers' costs this year, for the first time in nearly a decade, and in the past three months alone have dropped 15% to 14.5 yuan per kilogram.翻译:今年，中国的生猪现金平均价格甚至远低于最高效生产者的成本，这是近十年来的首次，并且仅在过去三个月就下跌了15%，至每公斤14.5元。

The most-active live hog futures on the Dalian Commodity Exchange have tumbled 7.3% since the beginning of last week to 13,910 yuan ($1,949) per metric ton, the lowest since they began trading almost three years ago.翻译:大连商品交易所最活跃的生猪期货自上周初以来已下跌 7.3%，至每吨 13,910 元人民币（1,949 美元），为近三年前开始交易以来的最低水平。

The downdraft has defied both state efforts to prop up prices with token purchases for official reserves, and the start of the peak winter season for pork consumption.翻译:国家通过象征性购买官方储备来提振价格的努力，以及冬季猪肉消费旺季的开始，都无济于事。

And it is squeezing a number of big producers in the $200 billion-a-year industry, with the top 10 producers alone recording a 13% increase in net debt this year as of end-September, according to state-run media.翻译:据官方媒体报道，这一年产值达 2000 亿美元的行业中的一些大型生产商受到挤压，截至 9 月底，仅前 10 名生产商的净债务就增加了 13%。

New Hope Liuhe (000876.SZ), China's third-largest producer and the world's fifth largest, sold off farms last year and told investors in July it wanted to sell more, while bringing in strategic investors to its poultry and food units.翻译:中国第三大、全球第五大生产商新希望六和（000876.SZ）去年出售了农场，并于7月告诉投资者希望出售更多，同时为其家禽和食品业务引入战略投资者。

The company has made "some progress" on those fronts, it told investors on Friday, but gave no details. It also said a 7.35 billion yuan private share issue announced on Nov. 30 would help it to repay loans and rein in debt.翻译:该公司周五告诉投资者，在这些方面已经取得了“一些进展”，但没有透露细节。该公司还表示，11月30日宣布的73.5亿元非公开发行股票将有助于其偿还贷款和控制债务。

Major producers Tech-Bank (002124.SZ) and Fujian Aonong (603363.SS) have been selling off stakes in themselves or in subsidiaries to raise cash, while Aonong's debt-to-equity ratio reached a hefty 8.26 in the third quarter according to LSEG data. Neither company responded to requests for comment about their current challenges and working capital requirements.

EXPANDING DEBT

Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology (002157.SZ), which became China's second-largest producer after a rapid expansion drive, was forced into a restructuring last year despite support from local government-run firms.翻译:江西正邦科技（002157.SZ）经过快速扩张成为中国第二大生产商，尽管有地方政府企业的支持，但去年仍被迫进行重组。

Moreover, with debt levels swelling across the Chinese economy, banks and local governments have become less willing or able to offer support.翻译:此外，随着中国经济的债务水平不断膨胀，银行和地方政府提供支持的意愿或能力越来越低。

"Over the past two years, banks could lend them a lot so these companies expanded very fast," said an analyst at an equity research firm, who was not authorised to speak to the media and declined to be named.翻译:一家股票研究公司的分析师表示：“过去两年，银行可以向他们提供大量贷款，因此这些公司扩张得非常快。”该分析师未获授权接受媒体采访，但拒绝透露姓名。

But now, especially given the companies' high debt levels, the analyst said: "It's hard for them to borrow any money from the banks."翻译:但现在，特别是考虑到这些公司的高债务水平，分析师表示：“他们很难从银行借到任何钱。”

Analysts say the biggest players - industry leader Muyuan Foods Co , a low-cost producer and one of the few generating cashflow, and No. 2 Wens Foodstuff Group Co (300498.SZ), which has reduced costs significantly - may be well-positioned for a shake-out.翻译:分析师表示，最大的参与者——行业领先者牧原食品有限公司（一家低成本生产商，也是为数不多的产生现金流的公司之一）和排名第二的温氏食品集团有限公司（300498.SZ） ——成本大幅降低——可能处于有利地位。进行一次洗牌。

But challenges are mounting as China produces record volumes of pork, in part a legacy of past encouragement from Beijing, which fears food price volatility and urged a major expansion of sow herds after an African swine fever outbreak in the late 2010s killed half the country's pigs.翻译:但随着中国猪肉产量创历史新高，挑战也越来越大，这在一定程度上是北京过去鼓励政策的结果。北京担心食品价格波动，并在2010年代末非洲猪瘟爆发导致中国一半生猪死亡后敦促大幅扩大母猪存栏量。

Muyuan alone has more than tripled its sow herd since 2018, chasing after market share along with other big publicly listed firms, and now has three times as many sows as WH Group (0288.HK), which owns top U.S. producer Smithfield Foods.翻译:自2018年以来，仅牧原公司的母猪存栏量就增加了两倍多，与其他大型上市公司一起争夺市场份额，目前母猪数量是万洲国际（0288.HK）的三倍，后者拥有美国顶级生产商史密斯菲尔德食品公司。

Analysts at Hua'an Securities forecast that hog output would jump 10% in the first half of 2024. That follows a 17% surge in the first nine months of this year at China's 15 big market-listed breeders even as they reported 200 billion yuan in combined net losses.翻译:华安证券分析师预测，2024年上半年生猪产量将增长10%。今年前9个月，中国15家大型上市养殖企业的产值达2000亿元，但生猪产量仍增长17%。合并净亏损。

To make matters worse, pork consumption in China has been hit both by slowing economic growth and by diners' changing preferences, as more health-conscious consumers - especially young people and urbanites - switch to poultry and other foods.翻译:更糟糕的是，中国的猪肉消费受到经济增长放缓和食客偏好变化的打击，越来越多注重健康的消费者——尤其是年轻人和城市居民——转向家禽和其他食品。

And the costs of battling disease have risen substantially, with African swine fever now endemic and a constant threat to all farms.翻译:与疾病作斗争的成本大幅上升，非洲猪瘟现已流行，并对所有农场构成持续威胁。

China's agriculture ministry has warned of heavier losses for the sector in early 2024 than a year ago and urged pig producers to cut output.翻译:中国农业部警告称，2024年初该行业的损失将比一年前更严重，并敦促生猪生产者减产。

While the big producers have slashed spending on new equipment and taken other cost-cutting measures, most remain reluctant to unload idle farms and reduce breeding herds.翻译:尽管大型生产商已经削减了新设备的支出并采取了其他削减成本的措施，但大多数生产商仍然不愿意出售闲置农场并减少种猪群。

"Leading companies aggressively expanded in 2020-21, the capex was huge, and they're not willing to reduce capacity, even under the current weak price," said Flora Zhu, director of China Corporate Research at Fitch Ratings.翻译:惠誉国际评级中国企业研究总监朱芙表示：“2020-21年，龙头企业积极扩张，资本支出巨大，即使在当前疲软的价格下，他们也不愿意减少产能。”
